original: api tu bhagavān buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cittaṃ buddhā eva bhagavantaṃ jñāsyanti, kiṃ mayā śrīmūlakalpe śakyamacintyādbhutaiśvaryavikurvitānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhavikurvituṃ jñātum
analyzed: api tu bhagavān buddhānām bhagavatām cittam buddhāḥ eva bhagavantam jñāsyanti kim mayā śrī mūla kalpe śakyam acintya adbhuta aiśvarya vikurvitānām bhagavatām buddha vikurvitum jñātum

original: cittacaritacaryānubhaveśanirdhārceṣṭitaṃ jñātuṃ vā samāsanirdeśato vā ka lpakoṭīnayutaśatasahakhairapi vaktum
analyzed: jñātum vā samāsa nirdeśataḥ vā vaktum

original: yo'yaṃ tathāgatānāṃ tathāgatani- horasamastavyastāśceṣamūrtyā saṃskṛtadharmato draṣṭavyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ yam tathāgatānām saṃskṛta dharmataḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: darśanaheyapurāṇāva lambināṃ caryā vaktuṃ guṇān vā kathayituṃ tathāgata evātra bhagavān jānīteḥ na vayam
analyzed: darśana heya purāṇa ava lambinām caryāḥ vaktum guṇān vā kathayitum tathāgataḥ eva atra bhagavān jānīteḥ na vayam

original: || atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ svariddhivikurvitanirmite mahā- ratnapane niṣaṇṇaḥ, bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ || atha bhagavāñchākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahā- sattvaṃ vividhakathānusāre tathāgatabhūtān pūrvapraśnapūrvaṅgamapuraḥsaradharmadeśa- nānukūlabodhisattvacacaryānirhārārthopasaṃhitena brāhmaṇa svareṇa kalaviṅka- rutaraciṃtagarjitadundubhisbaranināditanirghoṣeṇa svareṇa mañjuśriyaṃ ku mārabhūtamāmantrayate sma
analyzed: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ svar iddhi vikurvita nirmite mahā ratna pane niṣaṇṇaḥ bhagavantam śākyamunim nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam bodhisattvam
svāgatam te mañjuśrīḥ

original: mahāsattva caryāsarva buddhayadhiṣṭhita nirhārasarvabodhisattvātrtyasamprāpakasarvamantrapadasarahasyābhi- ṣekamudrāmaṇḍalakalyabhiṣeka āyurārogyaiśvaryasarvāśāpāripūrakaḥ sarvasā- dhanaupayikatantrajñānajñeyakālāntarādhānarājyakṣetra atītānāgatavartamā- nasaṃkṣepataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāśāpāripūraka svaguṇoddhodhanamantracaryānu- vattitaparasattvaprītikaraṇa antarddhānākāśagamana pādapracārika me- dhāvīkaraṇa ākarṣaṇa pātālapraveśana ābhicārika sarvakāmāvāptisa- kula yakṣayakṣiṇī kiṅkarapiśācasarvabhūtākarṣaṇa bālavṛddhataruṇaya- thāsthitisthāpakaḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sarvakarmakara sarvamanorathaparipūraka ābhicā- raka śāntikaprauṣṭikeṣu prakurvāṇaḥ, yathā yathā prayujyamānastathā tathā śrāvyamānabodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakaṃ mahākalparatnapaṭalavisaraṃ asmābhi- ranujñātaḥ sarvabuddhaiśca bhāṣantaṃ śuddhasattva + + + + ye dharmakośaṃ bahuja- nahitāya bahujanakāmāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvasattvānu- ddiśya
analyzed: mahāsattva nirhāra sarva bodhisattva ātrtya samprāpaka sarva mantra pada sa rahasya abhiṣeka mudrā maṇḍala kali abhiṣeka āyuḥ ārogya aiśvarya sarva āśā pāripūrakaḥ sarva sā dhana aupayika saṃkṣepataḥ sarva karmakara sarva manoratha paripūrakaḥ ābhicāraka śāntika prauṣṭikeṣu prakurvāṇaḥ yathā yathā prayujyamānaḥ tathā tathā śrāvyamāna bodhisattva piṭaka avataṃsakam mahā kalpa ratna

original: || atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānajyotiraśmi- vyūhālaṅkārasañcodanīṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpadyate
analyzed: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ sarva buddha adhiṣṭhāna jyotiḥ raśmi vyūhālaṅkārasañcodanīm nāma bodhisattva samādhim samāpadyate
prathamaḥ parivartaḥ

original: yāvad + bhuvanaṃ yāvacca avī- cirmahānarakaṃ ye kecit sattvacā suduḥkhitāḥ, sarve te duḥkhapraśamana- śānti ca jagmuḥ
analyzed: yāvat bhuvanam yāvat ca ye kecid su duḥkhitāḥ sarve te ca jagmuḥ

original: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvān buddhāṃca bhagavatāṃ sañcodya punareva sā raśmirmajjuśriyasya bodhisattvasya mūrdhanyantardhī- yate sma
analyzed: sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha bodhisattvān buddhān ca bhagavatām sañcodya punar eva sā raśmiḥ majjuśriyasya bodhisattvasya mūrdhani antardhī yate sma

original: || atrāntare pūrvasyāṃ diśi ye vyavasthitā buddhakṣetrāḥ, tatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ sañcoditāḥ, tena raśmidhātumaṇḍalīsamudyotitanirdhāreṇa
analyzed: atra antare pūrvasyām diśi ye vyavasthitāḥ buddhakṣetrāḥ tatra buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sañcoditāḥ tena raśmi dhātu maṇḍalī samudyotita nirdhāreṇa

original: tadyathā - jyotissaumyagandhāvabhāsaśrīrnāma tathāgataḥ, bhaiṣajyaguru- vaidūryaprabharājastathāgataḥ, samantāvabhāsaśrīnarnāma tathāgataḥ, samudbhatarā- jo nāma tathāgataḥ, śālendrarājo nāma tathāgataḥ, lokendrarājo nāma tathāgataḥ, tathāgataḥ, amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājo nāma tathāgataḥ, anantāvabhā- sarājendro nāma tathāgataḥ, jyotiraśmirājendro nāma tathāgataḥ, evaṃ- bhaṃmukhā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtāḥ anantānanteṣu ca lo- kadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyak sambuddhāḥ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ śuddhāvāsa- bhavanasthaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgatāmaīntaṃ samyak sambuddhaṃ mañjuśriyā sārdha kumārabhūtena bodhisattvacaryānirdeśamantrapadārthapaṭalavisaraṃ bhāṣantaṃ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ sannipateyuḥ
analyzed: tat yathā jyotiḥ saumya gandha avabhāsa śrīḥ nāma tathāgataḥ bhaiṣajya guru vaidūrya prabha rājaḥ tathāgataḥ samantāvabhāsaśrīnaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ samudbhatarā jaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ śālendra bhavana stham ca śākyamunim tathāgatām aīntam samyak sambuddham mañjuśriyā sārdha kumāra bhūtena bodhisattva caryā nirdeśa mantra padārtha paṭala visaram bhāṣantam te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sannipateyuḥ
evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimasyām uttarasyām dikṣu vidikṣu

original: | ityūrdhvamadhastiryak sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetrānavabhāsya sarveṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu sarvamārabhavanāni jihvīkṛtya sabodhisattvagaṇapariṣkṛtāḥ sa- śrāvakasaṅghapuraskṛtāśca taṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanaṃ buddhavikurvaṇabodhisattvamā- hātmyaṃ ca darśayitukāmā mantracaryānirhārasamādhiviśeṣapaṭalavisarata- thāgataśāsanamapratihataṃ codyotayitukāmāḥ pratyasthāt
analyzed: iti ūrdhvam adhas tiryak sarvāvantam buddhakṣetrān avabhāsya sarveṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu sarva māra bhavanāni jihvīkṛtya sa bodhisattva gaṇa pariṣkṛtāḥ sa śrāvaka saṅgha puraskṛtāḥ ca tam

original: || tadyathā - subāhu, suratna, suvrata, sunetra, sūrata, sudharma, sarvārthasiddhi, sarvodbhata, dharmodrata, ranogata, ranaśrīḥ, peruśrīḥ, acintyaśrīḥ, prabhā- karaśrīḥ, prabhaśrīḥ, jyotiśrīḥ, sarvārthaśrīḥ, sarvaratnapāṇiḥ, cūḍāmaṇiḥ, merudhvajapāṇiḥ, vairocanagarbhaḥ, ratnagarbhaḥ, jñānagarbhaḥ, sacintyārthagarbhaḥ, acintyārthagarbhaḥ, dharmodbhatagarbhaḥ, dhvajaketuḥ, suketuḥ, anantaketuḥ, śrīmūlakalpe vimalakatuḥ, gaganaketuḥ, ratnaketuṃḥ, garjitaghoṣadundubhisvararājāḥ, a- nantāvabhāsajñānarājaḥ, sarvatamo'ndhakāravidhamanarājaḥ, sarvavikiraṇa-
analyzed: tat yathā subāhu suratna suvrata sunetra sūrata sudharma sarva artha siddhi sarvodbhata dharmodrata ranogata rana śrīḥ peru śrīḥ acintya śrīḥ prabhā kara śrīḥ prabha śrīḥ jyotiśrīḥ sarva sarva vikiraṇa

original: bodhividhvaṃsanarājaḥ, sarvacaryātiśayajñānarājaḥ, lokendrarāja, atiśaye- ndrarāja, vidhamanarāja, nirdhūtarāja, ādityarāja, abhāvasamudgatarāja, svabhāvasamudbhatarāja, abhāvasvabhāvasamudratarāja, avivakṣitarāja, sva- bhāvapuṇyābhaḥ, lokābhaḥ, amitābhaḥ, mitābhaḥ, anantābhaḥ, sune- trābhaḥ, susambhavābhaḥ, arthabhāvābhaḥ, adhṛṣyaḥ, amṛṣyaḥ, akarṣaḥ, a- kaniṣṭhaḥ, amalaḥ, analaḥ, dyuti pati mati sukha mukha nemi nimi ke- tu ṛkṣa divideva divya nābhi ravana lokaśānti upāriṣṭa dundubhisiddha śiva ākhyadivya duprasaha durdharṣa durālabha dūraṅgama durālabha dūrasthita ūrdhvadravyatama khadyota samahadyota adyota ṛṣabha ābha sumanāya sumana mahādeva sunirmala malānta dānta sami sucihna śvetadhvaja imi kimi kaniṣṭha nikarṣa jīva sujāta dhūmaketu dhvajaketu śvetaketu suketu vasuketu basava pitāmaha pitaraniṣkakurulokākhya samantākhya mahārūya śreyasi tejasi jyotikiraṇa samantakara lokaṅkara divaṅkara dīpaṅkara bhūtānta- kara sarvārthaṅkara siddhaṅkara dyotiṅkara avabhāsaṅkara dundubhisvara rutasvara susvara anantasvara ketusvara bhūtamuni kanakamuni ṛkcchandaḥ kāśya- paścikhi viśvabhuk vipaści śākyamuniśreti
analyzed: bodhi vidhvaṃsanarājaḥ sarvacaryātiśayajñānarājaḥ lokendrarāja atiśaye ndrarāja vidhamanarāja nirdhūtarāja ādityarāja abhāvasamudgatarāja svabhāvasamudbhatarāja abhāva svabhāvasamudratarāja dūraṅgama durālabha dūra sthita ūrdhva dravyatama khadyota samahadyota adyotaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ ābha sumanāya sumana mahādeva sunirmala malānta dānta sami sucihna śvetadhvaja imi kimi kaniṣṭha kanakamuni ṛk chandaḥ kāśya paścikhi viśvabhuj vipaści

original: etaiścānyaiśca bahubhirbuddhe- rbhagavadbhistaṃ śuddhāvāsabhavanamavabhāsya, padmāsaneṣu ca sthitvā, bhūdevaṃ bodhisattvagaṇācājahāraṃ evaṃrūpāḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ buddheḥ bhagavadbhiḥ tam śuddhāvāsa bhavanam avabhāsya padmāsaneṣu ca sthitvā bhūdevam bodhisattva gaṇāḥ ca ājahāram evaṃrūpāḥ

original: tadyathā - ratnapāṇiḥ, vajrapāṇiḥ, supāṇiḥ, anantapāṇi kṣitipāṇi ā- kokapāṇi sunirmala sukūpa prabhūtakūṭa maṇikūṭa ratnakūṭa ratnahasti samanta- hasti gandhahasti sugati vimalagati lokagati cārugati anantagati anantakīrti vimalakīrti gatikīrti amalakīrti kīrtikīrti nātha anātha nāthabhūta lokanātha samantanātha ātreya anantatreya samantatreya maitreya sunetreya namantatreya tvaddhatreya sarūlātreya trirantātreya triśara- ṇātreya triyānātreya visphūrja sumanodbhavarṇavāṃ dharmīśvaraḥ, abhāve- śvaraḥ, sammateśvaraḥ, lokeśvaraḥ, avalokiteśvaraḥ, sulokiteśvara vi- kokiteśvara lokamaha sumaha garjiteśvara dundubhisbara vitateśvara vidhva prabhamaḥ parivartaḥ
analyzed: tat yathā ratnapāṇiḥ vajrapāṇiḥ supāṇiḥ anantapāṇi kṣitipāṇi ā kokapāṇi sunirmala sukūpa prabhūtakūṭa maṇikūṭa ratnakūṭa ratnahasti samanta hasti gandhahasti sugati vimalagati lokeśvaraḥ avalokiteśvaraḥ sulokiteśvara vi kokiteśvara lokamaha sumaha garjiteśvara dundubhisbara vitateśvara vidhva prabhamaḥ parivartaḥ

original: steśvara suvakṣa sumūrti sumahad yaśovata ādityaprabhāva prabhaviṣṇuḥ so- meśvara soma saumya anantaśrī lokaśrī gagana gaganāḍhya gaganagaṃ+kṣi- teśvara maheśvara kṣitikṣitigarbha nīvaraṇa sarvāvaraṇa sarvāvaraṇa viṣkambhi sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhi samantanirmathanaḥ samantabhadraḥ bhadrapāṇiḥ sudhanaḥ susaṃhataḥ rasupuṣya sunabha ākāśa ākāśagarbhaḥ savārthagarbhaḥ sarvodbhava anivartī anivartita apāyajaha avivartita avaivattikasarvadharmopaceti
analyzed: steśvara suvakṣa sumūrti su mahat yaśovata ādityaprabhāva prabhaviṣṇuḥ soma īśvara soma saumya ananta śrī lokaśrī gagana gaganāḍhya gaganagaṃ teśvara maheśvara kṣiti kṣiti garbha

original: etaiścānyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaicaiḥ sārdha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ śuddhāvā- sabhavane viharīta sma
analyzed: etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ sārdha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sa bhavane viharīta sma

original: anyairapi bodhisattvaimehāsacccaiḥ strīrūpadhāribhiḥ anantacaryārtha- lokanirahārasakalasattvāśaya anivartanamārgapratiṣṭhāpanatayācintyā- vidyāpadamantradhāraṇī oṣadhaveṣarūpadhāribhirnānāvidhapakṣigaṇayakṣarākṣa- samaṇimantraratnarājasattva asattvasaṅkhyātasamanupraveśasattvacaryānuvartibhi- ryathāsayasattvavinayatathānukāribhiḥ tatprativiśiṣṭarūpānuvartibhirvidyā- rājopadeśayathāvabodhadharmaniryātatathāgatābjakuliśasarvalaukikalokotta- rasamanupraveśasamayānatikramaṇīyavacanapathapratiṣṭhāpana turatnavaṃśānupaccheda- kartṛbhiḥ tadyathā - uṣṇīṣa atyadbhuta atyunnata sitātapatra anantapatra śatapatra jayoṣrṇāṣa lokottara vijayoṣṇīṣa abhyudgatoṣṇīṣa kamalaraśmi kanakaraśmi sitaraśmi vyūḍhoṣṇīṣa kanakarāśi sitarāśi tejorāśi maṇirāśi samanantarāśi vikhyātarāśi bhūtarāśi satyarāśi abhā- vasvabhāvarāśi avitatharāśi etaiścānyaiśroṣṇīṣarājairanantadharmadhātupra- viṣṭairyathāśayasattvābhiprāyapāripūrakaiḥ sarvajinahṛdayasamantāganairna śakyaṃ kalpakoṭī niyutaśatasahastrairapi uṣṇīṣarājñāṃ gaṇanāparyantaṃ vaktum, acintyabalaparākramāṇāṃ māhātmyaṃ vā kathayitum
analyzed: anyaiḥ api strī rūpa dhāribhiḥ ananta caryā artha loka nirahāra sakala sattva āśaya a nivartana mārga pratiṣṭhāpana tayā acintyā vidyā pada mantra dhāraṇī oṣadha veṣa rūpa dhāribhiḥ tu ratna vaṃśa an upaccheda kartṛbhiḥ tat yathā uṣṇīṣa atyadbhuta atyunnata sitātapatra anantapatra śatapatra jayoṣrṇāṣa lokottara vijayoṣṇīṣa abhyudgata uṣṇīṣa kamala raśmi kanaka vaktum acintya bala parākramāṇām māhātmyam vā kathayitum
samāsa nirdeśataḥ saṃkṣepataḥ ca kathyate
vidyā rājñīnām samāgamam vakṣyate

original: tadyathā - ūrṇā dhūlocanā padmā śravaṇaḥ grīvā abhayā karuṇā maitrī kṛpā prajñā raśmi cetanā prabhā nirmalā dhīvarā tathānyāśca vidyārājñī- bhiranantāparyantatathāgatamūrtanissṛṣṭābhiḥ
analyzed: tat yathā ūrṇā dhūlocanā padmā śravaṇaḥ grīvā abhayā karuṇā maitrī kṛpā prajñā raśmi cetanā prabhā nirmalā dhīvarā tathā anyāḥ ca vidyā rājñī bhiḥ ananta aparyanta tathāgata

original: tadyathā - tuśrīmūla kalpe tavāgatayātra dharmacakra tathāgataśayana tathāgatāvabhāsa tathāgatavaca- na tathāgatoṣṭha tathāgatoru tathāgatāmala tathāgatadhvaja tathāgataketu tathā- gatacihnaśceti
analyzed: tat yathā kalpe tava āgatayā atra dharmacakra tathāgata śayana tathāgata avabhāsa tathāgata vaca na tathāgata uṣṭha tathāgata ūru tathāgata amala tathāgata dhvaja tathāgata ketu tathā gata

original: etaiścānyaiśca tathāgatamatrabhāṣitairvidyārājñarājñīkiṅkara ceṭaceṭī dūtadūtī yakṣayakṣī sattvacāsattvaiśca prativiśiṣṭavyūhālaṅkāradharmame- ghānniḥsṛtaiḥ samādhiviśeṣaniṣyanditairaparimitakoṭīśatasahasraparivāritaiḥ sarvavidyāgaṇa uparyupari pravartamānairvidyārājñaiḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca tathāgata matra bhāṣitaiḥ vidyā rājña rājñī kiṅkara ceṭa ceṭī dūta dūtī yakṣa yakṣī sattva cāsattvaiḥ ca prativiśiṣṭa vyūha alaṅkāra dharma meghāt niḥsṛtaiḥ
te pi tatra śuddhāvāsabha vanam adhiṣṭhitavān abhūvam

original: tadyathā -- bhagavān dvādaśabhujaḥ paḍbhujaḥ caturbhujaḥ hālāhalaḥ amoghapāśaḥ śvetahayagrīvaḥ sugrīva anantagrīva nīlagrīva sugrīva sukarṇaḥ śvetakarṇaḥ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ lokakaṇṭha vilokita avalokita īśvarasahasraraśmi manaḥ manasaḥ vikhyātamanasaḥ kamalaḥ kamalapāṇiḥ manorathaḥ āśvāsakaḥ prahasita sukeśa keśānta nakṣatra nakṣatrarāja saumya sugata damakaśceti
analyzed: tat yathā bhagavān dvādaśa bhujaḥ paḍbhujaḥ caturbhujaḥ hālāhalaḥ amoghapāśaḥ śveta hayagrīvaḥ sugrīva anantagrīva nīlagrīva sugrīva sukarṇaḥ śvetakarṇaḥ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ lokakaṇṭha
etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca vidyā rājaiḥ abja uṣṇīṣa pramukhaiḥ ananta nirdhāra dharma megha nisya samādhi bhūtaiḥ aneka śata sahasra koṭī niyuta vidīpa parivāritaiḥ anekaiḥ ca vidyā rājñībhiḥ

daśa bhūmyā anantaram te tatra

original: anekaiśca mahāśrāvikā- samavaśaraṇanirvāṇadhātusamanubhaviṣṭābhiḥ asaṃskṛtayāvamānayānāvala- mbibhiḥ śuddhābhirvītarāgābhiḥ samantadyotisamanuprāptābhiḥ dakṣiṇīya- kṣetraguṇādhānaviśothibhiḥ sattvacasāramaṇḍabhūtābhiḥ lokāgrādhipatībhiḥ pūjyadevamanuṣyapuṇyakṣetradvipadacatuṣpadabahupada apada sarvasattvāgrādhipa- tībhiḥ tadyathā - yaśodharā yaśodā mahāprajāpatī prajāpatī sujātā nandā sthūlanandā sunandā dhyāyinī sundarī anantā viśākhā manorathā jayavatī vīrā upanīrā devatā sudevatā āśritā śriyā pravarā mamuditā priyaṃvadā rohiṇī dhṛtarāṣṭrā dhṛtā svāmikā sampadā vapuṣā
analyzed: anekaiḥ ca mahāśrāvikā samavaśaraṇa nirvāṇa dhātu samanubhaviṣṭābhiḥ asaṃskṛtayā avamāna yāna avalambibhiḥ śuddhābhiḥ vīta rāgābhiḥ samantadyoti samanuprāptābhiḥ dakṣiṇīya kṣetra guṇa ādhāna priyaṃvadā rohiṇī dhṛtarāṣṭrā dhṛtā svāmikā sampadā vapuṣā
prathamaḥ parivartaḥ

original: śuddhā premā jaṭā upajaṭā samantajaṭā bhavāntikā bhāvatī manojavā keśavā viṣṇulā viṣṇuvatī sumanā bahumatā śreyasī duḥkhāntā karmadā ka + + + + + + + + vasudā dharma- dā narmadā tāmrā sutāmrā kīrtivatī manovatī prahasitā tribhavāntā trimalāntā duḥkhaśāyikā nirvāṇā triparṇā padmavarṇā padmāvatī padma- prabhā padmā padmāvatī triparṇī saptavarṇī utpalavarṇā ceti |

original: etā eva mahāparṣanmaṇḍalaṃ mahābodhisattvatvikurvaṇaṃ prabhāvayitu- kāmāḥ sannipatitāḥ sanniṣaṇṇā abhūvam |

dharma śravaṇāya mantra caryā artha nirhāram udyotayitu kāmā bhūvam

original: atha bhagavān śākyamunistaṃ sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya śuddhādhyāsayaḥ abhāvasvabhāvagaganasvabhāvatriparvasamatikramaṇaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
analyzed: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ tam sarvāvantam parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya śuddha adhyāsayaḥ abhāva svabhāva gagana svabhāva tri parva samatikramaṇam sattvadhātum viditvā mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate

original: kiṃ punarduṣṭacetasā manuṣyāḥ, itare vā vighnnā yamāntakakrodha- bhayā nirnaṣṭā vidravanti ito ita iti ||
analyzed: kim punar duṣṭa cetasāḥ manuṣyāḥ itare vā vighnāḥ yama antaka krodha bhayāḥ nirnaṣṭāḥ vidravanti itas itas iti

original: manjuśrīmūlakalpa tato'nupsādhakena tatraiva kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭena yamāntakakrodharā- jānaṃ japaṃ kurvāṇa sthātavyam
analyzed: tatas nup sādhakena tatra eva kuśa viṇḍaka upaviṣṭena japam kurvāṇa sthātavyam

original: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa bhagavataḥ śākya- muneḥ pratimāyā dakṣiṇe pārśve dvau pratyekabuddhau padmāsanopaviṣṭau paryaṅkano- paviṣṭau kāryoṃ, tayoradhastād dvau mahāśrāvakau dharma śṛṇvantaḥ kāryoṃ
analyzed: tatas maṇḍala ācāryeṇa bhagavataḥ śākya muneḥ pratimāyāḥ dakṣiṇe pārśve dvau pratyekabuddhau padmāsana upaviṣṭau paryaṅkana u paviṣṭau kāryauṃ tayoḥ adhastāt dvau mahāśrāvakau dharma

original: teṣāmapi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ śa- ratkāṇḍagauraḥ padmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ, vāmahastena padmaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇahastena baradaḥ
analyzed: teṣām api dakṣiṇatas bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sarva alaṅkāra vibhūṣitaḥ śa rat kāṇḍa gauraḥ padmāsana upaviṣṭaḥ vāma hastena padmam gṛhītvā dakṣiṇa hastena baradaḥ

original: tasyāpi dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavatī paṇḍaravāsinī padmahastā dakṣiṇena hastena bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ vandamānā padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇā jaṭāmakuṭadhā- riṇī śvetapaṭṭavastranivastā paṭṭāṃśukottarāsaṅginī kṛṣṇabhasmatṛmuṇḍī- kṛtā
analyzed: tasya api dakṣiṇatas bhagavatī paṇḍara vāsinī padma hastā dakṣiṇena hastena bhagavantam śākyamunim vandamānā padmāsana upaniṣaṇṇā jaṭā makuṭa dhāriṇī śveta paṭṭavastra nivastā paṭṭa

original: evaṃ tārā, jhukuṭī svakasvakāsaneryāyathe susthitā kāryā
analyzed: evam tārā jhukuṭī svaka svaka āsanā īryāyathe susthitā kāryā

original: upariṣṭācca bhagavatī teṣāṃ prajñāpāramitā, tathāgatalocanā, uṣṇīṣa- rājā svakāryāḥ
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ca bhagavatī teṣām prajñāpāramitā tathāgata locanā uṣṇīṣa rājā sva kāryāḥ
evam bodhisattva cāḥ ṣoḍaśa kāryāḥ

original: tadyathā - samantabhadraḥ, kṣitigarbhaḥ, gaganagañjaḥ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī, apāya- jaha maitreyaḥ, camaravyagrahastaḥ, buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ, vimala- gatiḥ, vimalaketuḥ, sudhana, candraprabha, vimalakīrti, sarvavyā- dhicikitsakaḥ sarvadharmīśvararājaḥ, lokagatiḥ, mahāmatiḥ, patidhara- śreti
analyzed: tat yathā samantabhadraḥ kṣitigarbhaḥ gaganagañjaḥ sarva nīvaraṇa viṣkambhī maitreyaḥ camara vyagra hastaḥ buddham bhagavantam nirīkṣamāṇaḥ vimala gatiḥ vimalaketuḥ sudhana candraprabha vimalakīrti

original: ete ṣoḍaśa mahābodhisattvāḥ prasannamūrtayaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūpitā lekhyāḥ
analyzed: ete ṣoḍaśa mahā bodhisattvāḥ prasanna mūrtayaḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūpitāḥ lekhyāḥ

original: sa ca yathāsmarataḥ āgamataśca yathāsthāneṣu vā śeṣā lekhyāḥ
analyzed: sa ca yathā smarataḥ āgamataḥ ca yathā sthāneṣu vā śeṣāḥ lekhyāḥ

original: ante ca sthāne caturaśrākāraṃ sthānaṃ sthāpaye padmapuṣpasaṃskṛtam
analyzed: ante ca sthāne caturaśra ākāram sthānam sthāpaye padma puṣpa saṃskṛtam

original: yena sma- ritā vidyā devatā te'smin sthāne tiṣṭhantviti ||
analyzed: yena sma ritā vidyā devatā te smin sthāne tiṣṭhantu iti

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ dvau pratyekabuddhau gandhamā- danaḥ, upāriṣṭaśceti
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ dvau pratyekabuddhau gandhamāḥ danaḥ upāriṣṭaḥ ca iti

original: evaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sarvataḥ praveśadvāraṃ kā- ryam
analyzed: evam prāc mukham maṇḍalam sarvatas praveśa dvāram kā

original: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pārśve aparau dvau pratyekabuddhau candanasiddha- ceni ālekhyau
analyzed: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pārśve aparau dvau pratyekabuddhau candanasiddha ceni ālekhyau
teṣām adhastāt dvau mahāśrāvakau mahākāśyapa mahākā tyāyanaḥ ca ālekhyau

original: teṣāmapi vāmataḥ āryavajrapāṇikuvalayaśyāmā- bhaḥ prasannamūrtiḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ dakṣiṇe cāmaravyagrahastaḥ vāmena krodhamūrti sṭaḥ vajramuṣṭiḥ vajrā‌ṅkuśi bajraśṛṅkhalā subāhu vajjrasena dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ
analyzed: teṣām api vāmatas ārya vajrapāṇi kuvalaya śyāmā prasanna mūrtiḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitaḥ dakṣiṇe cāmara vyagra hastaḥ vāmena vajramuṣṭiḥ vajrā bajraśṛṅkhalā subāhu vajjrasena
yathā veṣa cihna sthāna āsana sarva vidyā rājñā rājñī sa parivāraḥ rūpa mudrā ādiṣu lekhyāḥ
teṣām api vāmatas caturaśra ākāram ubhaya vajra mudrām

original: likhya ca vaktavyam, ye'tra sthāne na smaritā vidyāgaṇāḥ, te'tra sthānena smaritā vidyāgaṇāḥ, te'tra sthāne tiṣṭhantviti ||
analyzed: likhya ca vaktavyam ye tra sthāne na smaritāḥ vidyā gaṇāḥ te tra sthānena smaritāḥ vidyā gaṇāḥ te tra sthāne tiṣṭhantu iti

original: teṣāmupariṣṭāt vedyāramitāḥ bhagavatī māmakī ālekhyāḥ sarvā- laṅkāravibhūṣitāśca tāḥ prasannamūrtayaḥ ||
analyzed: teṣām upariṣṭāt vedyāramitāḥ bhagavatī māmakī ālekhyāḥ sarvāḥ laṅkāra vibhūṣitāḥ ca tāḥ prasanna mūrtayaḥ
teṣām api upariṣṭāḥ aṣṭau uṣṇīpa rājānaḥ samanta jvāla mālā kulāḥ
mudrā ca svaka svakāni mahā rāja cakravartī rūpāṇi ālekhyāni
kanaka varṇa su prasanna indriyāṇi sarva alaṅkāra vibhūṣitāni
īṣat tathāgataḥ pratima dṛṣṭi jātāni

original: tadyathā cakravartī, uṣṇīṣaḥ, abhyudgatoṣṇī- ṣa, sitātapatra, jayoṣṇīṣa, kamaloṣṇīṣa, tejorāśi, unnatoṣṇīṣa iti ||
analyzed: tat yathā cakravartī uṣṇīṣaḥ abhyudgata uṣṇīṣa sitātapatra jayoṣṇīṣa kamaloṣṇīṣa tejorāśi unnata uṣṇīṣaḥ iti

original: ete ataḥ uṣṇīṣarājānaḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vāmataḥ ālekhya, dvāre buddho bodhisattvo kāryapraveśatadakṣiṇato lokātikrāntagāmī nāma jaṭāmakuṭadhārī saumyamūrtiḥ dakṣiṇahastena akṣasūtraṃ gṛhītvā vāmahastena kamaṇḍaluṃ dvārābhimukhaḥ īṣadjhukkuṭīvadanaḥ vāmataḥ praveśe mahābodhisatva ajitañjayo nāma ālekhyaḥ
analyzed: ete atas uṣṇīṣa rājānaḥ pratyekabuddhānām vāmatas ālekhya dvāre buddhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ loka atikrānta gāmī nāma jaṭā makuṭa dhārī saumya mūrtiḥ dakṣiṇa hastena akṣasūtram gṛhītvā vāma

original: prasannamūrtiḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī daṇḍakama- ṇḍaluvāmakarāvasaktaḥ dakṣiṇahastena akṣasūtraṃ gṛhītvā varapradānakaraḥ ī- ṣad‌kṣukkuṭīvadanaḥ dvārābhimukha ālekhyaḥ ||
analyzed: prasanna mūrtiḥ jaṭā makuṭa dhārī daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu vāma kara avasaktaḥ dakṣiṇa hastena akṣa sūtram gṛhītvā vara pradāna karaḥ dvāra abhimukhaḥ ālekhyaḥ

original: siṃhāsanasyādhastād dharmacakraḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ, tasyā- pyadhastāt ratnavimānaḥ, tatrastho bhagavāṃ mahābodhisattvaḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kumārarūpī kuṅ‌kumagaurākāraḥ prasannamūrtiḥ cārurūpī īṣida prahasitavadanaḥ vāmahaste nīlotpalāvasaktaḥ dakṣiṇahastena śrīphalāva- saktavaradaḥ sarvabāḻālaṅkārabhūṣitapañcacīrakopaśobhitaḥ muktāvalīya- sopavītaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ paṭṭavastranivastaḥ samantaprabhaḥ samantajvāla mālākulaḥ padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ yamāntakakrodharājagatadṛṣṭiḥ maṇḍalamave- śadvārābhimukhaḥ cārudarśano sarvataḥ ālekhyaḥ ||
analyzed: siṃhāsanasya adhastāt dharma cakraḥ samanta jvāla mālā ākulaḥ tasyāḥ api adhastāt ratna vimānaḥ tatrasthaḥ bhagavām mahā bodhisattvaḥ mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ kumāra rūpī kuṅ kuma gaura cārudarśano sarvatas ālekhyaḥ

original: mañjuśrīmūlakalpe tasya dakṣiṇe pārśve padmasyādhastād yamāntakaḥ krodharājā ā- lekhyaḥ mahāvikṛtarūpī samantajvālamālākulaḥ ājñāṃ pratīcchamānaḥ mahābodhisattvagatadṛṣṭiḥ sarvata ālekhyaḥ
analyzed: mañjuśrī mūla kalpe tasya dakṣiṇe pārśve padmasya adhastāt yama antakaḥ krodha rājā ā lekhyaḥ mahā vikṛta rūpī samanta jvāla mālā ākulaḥ ājñām pratīcchamānaḥ mahā bodhisattva gata

original: vāmapārśve padmasyādhastācchu- • jāvāsakāyikāḥ devaputrarūpiṇaḥ bodhisattvāḥ pañca ālekhyāḥ
analyzed: vāma pārśve padmasya adhastāt śu jāvāsa kāyikāḥ devaputra rūpiṇaḥ bodhisattvāḥ pañca ālekhyāḥ

original: ta- dyathā - sunirmalaḥ, sudāntaḥ, suśāntaḥ, saṃśuddhaḥ, tamodghātanaḥ, sa- mantābalokaśceti
analyzed: tat yathā su nirmalaḥ su dāntaḥ su śāntaḥ saṃśuddhaḥ tama udghātanaḥ sa mantā abalokaḥ ca iti

original: sarve ca te śuddhāvāsabhavanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ anekaratnojva- laśilātalākāraḥ samantajvālavicitrapuṣpāvakīrṇaścārurūpī ālekhyaḥ||
analyzed: sarve ca te śuddha āvāsa bhavana upaniṣaṇṇaḥ aneka ratnaḥ jvala śilā tala ākāraḥ samanta jvāla vicitra puṣpa avakīrṇaḥ cāru rūpī ālekhyaḥ

original: bahiḥ samantāccaturaśrākāraṃ catustoraṇākāraṃ caturdiśaṃ vici- trapañcaraṅgojjvalaṃ supraguṇarekhāvanaddhaṃ abhyantaramaṇḍalaṃ kāryam
analyzed: bahis samantāt caturaśra ākāram catur toraṇa ākāram caturdiśam vicitra pañca raṅga ujjvalam su praguṇa rekhā avanaddham abhyantara maṇḍalam kāryam

original: pū- rvāyāṃ diśi bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭād rekhābhiḥ madhye sakusu- mitarājendraḥ padmāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ tathāgatavigrahaḥ svalpamātraḥ kārya- samantajvālamālākulaḥ varadapradānahastaḥ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇaḥ ||
analyzed: rvāyām diśi bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭāt rekhābhiḥ madhye mita rāja indraḥ padmāsana upaniṣaṇṇaḥ tathāgata vigrahaḥ su alpa mātraḥ samanta jvāla mālā ākulaḥ vara da pradāna hastaḥ
tasya dakṣiṇatas uṣṇīṣa cakravarti mudrā lekhyā
vāmatas tejaḥ rā śi mudrā lekhyā
tathāgata locanāyāḥ upariṣṭāt prajñāpāramitā mudrā lekhyā

original: bhagavataḥ āryāvalokiteśvarasyopariṣṭāt prajñāpāramitāmudrāyā dakṣiṇataḥ bhagavānamitābhaḥ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kāryaḥ varapradānahastaḥ pa- dyāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ ||
analyzed: bhagavataḥ ārya avalokiteśvarasya upariṣṭāt prajñāpāramitā mudrāyāḥ dakṣiṇatas bhagavān amita ābhaḥ tathāgata vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ vara pradāna hastaḥ samanta jvāla mālā ākulaḥ
tasya api dakṣiṇatas pātra cīvara mudre kāryoṃ
evamanupūrvatas praveśa sthāne padma mudrā kāryāḥ

original: bhagavato saṅkusumitarājasya tathāgatasya vā mato uṣṇīṣatejorāśimudrā lekhyā samantajvālamālākulāḥ ||
analyzed: bhagavataḥ saṅkusumitarājasya tathāgatasya vā mataḥ uṣṇīṣa tejaḥ rāśi mudrā lekhyā samanta jvāla mālā ākulāḥ

original: tasyāpi vāmataḥ ratnaketustathāgataḥ kāryaḥ, ratnaparvatopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dharma deśayamānaḥ nīlavaiḍūryamarakatapadmarāgavicitrajvālārciṣi nirgata-
analyzed: tasya api vāmatas ratnaketuḥ tathāgataḥ kāryaḥ ratna parvata upaniṣaṇṇaḥ dharma deśayamānaḥ nīla vaiḍūrya marakata padmarāga vicitra jvālā arciṣi nirgata arciṣi
samantāt samanta prabhaḥ ālekhyaḥ

original: tasyāpi vāmataḥ jayoṣṇīṣamudrā samantajvālamālākulā ā- lekhyā |
analyzed: tasya api vāmatas jaya uṣṇīṣa mudrā samanta jvāla mālā ākulā lekhyā

original: tasyāpi vāmataḥ dharmacakramudrā ālekhyā samantajvālā- vatī|
analyzed: tasya api vāmatas dharmacakra mudrā ālekhyā samanta jvālā vatī
tasya api vāmatas khakharaka kamaṇḍalum akṣasūtra kamaṇḍalum bhadrapīṭha mudrā ālekhyā

original: anupūrvataḥ dvārasthāne vajrasūcyobhayataḥ samantajvāla dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ |
analyzed: anupūrvatas dvāra sthāne vajra sūcyā ubhayatas samantajvāla dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ
ālekhyaḥ

original: bhagavato mañjuśriyasyādhastānmahāmudrā pañcaśikhā nāma utpalamudrā vā lekhyā |
analyzed: bhagavataḥ mañjuśriyasya adhastāt mahā mudrā pañcaśikhā nāma utpala mudrā vā lekhyā
samanta jvālinau etau anyaḥ nyāsaktam samanta maṇḍala ākāram ālekhyam
dvārataḥ paścāt mukha praveśataḥ prāc mukhaḥ ca kāryaḥ

original: sarveṣvapi bahirmaṇḍalaṃ bhavati pañcavarṇaraṅgojjvalaṃ vicitracārudarśanaṃ, catuḥkoṇavibhaktaṃ, catustoraṇākāraṃ caturdiśaṃ dvihastamātrābhyantaramaṇḍa- lato bahirālekhyam |
analyzed: sarveṣu api bahis maṇḍalam bhavati pañca varṇa raṅga ujjvalam vicitra cāru darśanam catur koṇa vibhaktam catur toraṇa ākāram caturdiśam dvi hasta mātra abhyantara maṇḍa bahis ālekhyam

original: pūrvasyāṃ diśi mahābrahmā caturmukhaḥ śuklavakhāna- vastaḥ śvetavastrottarāsaṅginaḥ śvetayajñopavītaḥ kanakavarṇaḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī daṇḍakamaṇḍaluṃ vāmāvasaktapāṇiḥ ||
analyzed: pūrvasyām diśi mahābrahmā catur mukhaḥ śveta vastra uttarāsaṅginaḥ śveta yajñopavītaḥ kanaka varṇaḥ jaṭā makuṭa dhārī daṇḍa kamaṇḍalum vāma avasakta pāṇiḥ

original: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ ābhāsvaro devaputraḥ kāryaḥ kanakavarṇaḥ dhyā- nāntaragatamūrttiḥ paṭṭavastranivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarīyaḥ suprasannavadanaḥ jaṭā- makuṭadhārī śvetayajñopavītaḥ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dakṣiṇahastena varadaḥ ||
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇatas ābhāsvaraḥ devaputraḥ kāryaḥ kanaka varṇaḥ dhyā na antara gata mūrttiḥ paṭṭavastra nivastaḥ paṭṭa aṃśuka uttarīyaḥ su prasanna vadanaḥ jaṭā makuṭa dhārī śveta

original: tasya dakṣiṇata akaniṣṭho devaputraḥ kāryaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ pra- sannamūttiḥ dhyānagatacetasaḥ paṭṭavastranivasananivastaḥ paṭṭāṃścakeāttarīyaḥ ||
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇatas akaniṣṭhaḥ devaputraḥ kāryaḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitaḥ sanna mūttiḥ dhyāna gata cetasaḥ paṭṭavastra nivasana nivastaḥ

original: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇahastena varadaḥ śvetayajñopa bītaḥ ||
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇatas paryaṅka upaviṣṭaḥ dakṣiṇa hastena vara daḥ śveta yajña upa bītaḥ

original: evamanupūrvataḥ santuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ, paranirmitaḥ, suyāmaśakrapra- bhṛtayo devaputrā ālekhyāḥ yathānupūrvataḥ yathāveṣasaṃskṛtāḥ |||
analyzed: evamanupūrvataḥ santuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ paranirmitaḥ suyāma śakra pra bhṛtayaḥ devaputrāḥ ālekhyāḥ yathā anupūrvataḥ yathā veṣa saṃskṛtāḥ

original: śakrasyādhastāccāturmahārājakāyikāḥ sadāmattāḥ mālādhāriṇo karoṭapāṇayaḥ vīṇādvitīyakā lekhyāḥ |
analyzed: śakrasya adhastāt cāturmahārājakāyikāḥ sadāmattāḥ mālā dhāriṇaḥ karoṭa pāṇayaḥ vīṇā dvitīyakāḥ lekhyāḥ
bhaumāḥ ca devaputrāḥ yathā anupūrvataḥ yathā veṣena ālekhyāḥ

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi avṛha anaya sudṛśa sudaśana parīttābha puṇyaprasavaprabhṛtayo devaputrā ālekhyā yathāveṣasthānāḥ ||
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇāyām diśi avṛha anaya sudṛśa sudaśana parīttābha puṇyaprasava prabhṛtayaḥ devaputrāḥ ālekhyāḥ yathā veṣa sthānāḥ

original: evaṃ paścimāyāṃ diśi cottarāyāṃ diśi teṣāmadhastād dvipa- kti āśritā ālekhyāḥ |
analyzed: evam paścimāyām diśi ca uttarāyām diśi teṣām adhastāt āśritāḥ ālekhyāḥ
dvitīya maṇḍalāt ū bahis tṛtīya maṇḍalam bhavati
caturdiśam catvāraḥ mahārājānaḥ anupūrvatas ālekhyāḥ

original: uttarāyāṃ diśi praviśato dakṣiṇaḥ dhanaduḥ, nidhisamīpasthaiḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ īṣadbhannakirīṭaḥ yakṣarūpī |
analyzed: uttarāyām diśi praviśataḥ dakṣiṇaḥ nidhi samīpa sthaiḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitaḥ īṣat bhanna kirīṭaḥ yakṣa rūpī

original: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ maṇibhadra- pūrṇabhadrau yakṣasenāpatī ālekhyau ||
analyzed: tasya dakṣiṇatas maṇibhadra pūrṇabhadrau yakṣa senāpatī ālekhyau
manjuśrī mūla kalpe evam anupūrvataḥ hārītī mahā yakṣiṇī ālekhyā

original: priyaṅkaraḥ ku māra utsaṅgopaviṣṭo maṇḍalaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ ālekhyāḥ |
analyzed: priyaṅkaraḥ ku māraḥ utsaṅga upaviṣṭaḥ maṇḍalam nirīkṣamāṇaḥ ālekhyāḥ
pañcikaḥ pi ṅgalaḥ bhīṣaṇaḥ ca ālekhyaḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca samīpe yakṣāṇāṃ mudrā ālekhyāḥ |
analyzed: teṣām ca samīpe yakṣāṇām mudrāḥ ālekhyāḥ

original: evamanupūrvataḥ varu- ṇo pāśahasta paścimāyāṃ diśi ālekhyaḥ |
nāgau nandopanandau ta- kṣakavāsukiprabhṛtayo'ṣṭau mahānāgarājānaḥ ālekhyāḥ ||
analyzed: nāgau nanda upanandau kṣaka vāsuki prabhṛtayaḥ ṣṭau mahā nāga rājānaḥ ālekhyāḥ

original: evaṃ dvipaṅkayāśritāḥ anupūrvataḥ yakṣarākṣasakinnaramahoragaṛṣayaḥ siddhapretapiśācagaruḍakinnaramanuṣyā manuṣyādyā oṣadhayaśca maṇiratnavi- śeṣāḥ parvatāḥ saritaḥ dvīpāśca anupūrvataḥ sarve pradhānā lekhyāḥ ||
analyzed: evam dvi paṅkayā āśritāḥ anupūrvatas yakṣa rākṣasa kinnara mahoraga ṛṣayaḥ siddha preta piśāca garuḍa kinnara manuṣyāḥ manuṣya ādyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ ca maṇi ratna viśeṣāḥ parvatāḥ saritaḥ
dakṣiṇāyām diśi yamaḥ ālekhyaḥ sa parivāraḥ
mātarāḥ sapta pūrva dakṣiṇasyām diśi

original: agniḥ samantajvālamālākulaḥ daṇḍakamaṇḍalu- akṣasūtravyagrapāṇiḥ jaṭāmakuṭadhārī śvetavastranivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśukottarāsa- ṅgikaḥ śvetayajñopavīta kanakavarṇaḥ bhasmatripuṇḍarīkṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: agniḥ samanta jvāla mālā ākulaḥ daṇḍa kamaṇḍalu akṣasūtra vyagra pāṇiḥ jaṭā makuṭa dhārī śveta vastra nivastaḥ paṭṭāṃśuka uttara āsaṅgikaḥ śveta yajñopavīta kanaka varṇaḥ
evam nānā karaṇa praharaṇa veṣa saṃsthāna varṇa tattva dvipaṅgī āśritāḥ lekhyāḥ

original: sarvataḥ praviśato bahirmaṇḍale umāpatirvṛṣavāhanastriśūlapāṇiḥ, umā ca devī kanakavarṇā sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitā, kārtikeyaśca mayūrāsanaḥ śaktyudyatahastaḥ kumārarūpī ṣaṇmukhaḥ raktābhāsamūrtiḥ pītavastranivastaḥ |
analyzed: sarvatas praviśataḥ bahis maṇḍale umāpatiḥ vṛṣavāhanaḥ triśūla pāṇiḥ umā ca devī kanaka varṇā sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitā kārtikeyaḥ ca mayūrāsanaḥ śakti udyata hastaḥ kumāra rūpī

original: pītavastrottarāsaṅgaḥ vāmahastena ghaṇṭāṃ gṛhītvā raktapatākāṃ ca anupū- rvataḥ bhṛddhiriṭi atyantakṛśākāraḥ mahāgaṇapatinandikeśvaramahākālau ..
analyzed: pīta vastra uttarāsaṅgaḥ vāma hastena ghaṇṭām gṛhītvā rakta patākām ca anupu rvataḥ atyanta kṛśa ākāraḥ mahāgaṇapati nandikeśvara mahākālau
mātarāḥ sapta yathā ābharaṇa praharaṇa veṣa saṃsthāna abhilekhyāḥ

original: aṣṭau vasavaḥ, sapta ṛṣayaḥ, viṣṇuścakrapāṇiścaturbhujo gadāśaṅkhāsihasto garuḍāsanaḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaśca |
analyzed: aṣṭau vasavaḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ viṣṇuḥ cakrapāṇiḥ catur bhujaḥ gadā śaṅkha asi hastaḥ garuḍa āsanaḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitaḥ ca

original: aṣṭau grahāḥ, saptaviṃśatinakṣatrāḥ, yeṣu caranti bhuvi maṇḍale upagrahācāṣṭā devā lekhyāḥ anupūrvaśaḥ pañcadaśa tithayaḥ sitakṛṣṇā, dvādaśa rāśayo ṣad ṛtavo, dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraśca |
analyzed: aṣṭau grahāḥ saptaviṃśati nakṣatrāḥ yeṣu caranti bhuvi maṇḍale upagrahāḥ ca aṣṭā devāḥ lekhyāḥ anupūrvaśas pañcadaśa tithayaḥ sita kṛṣṇāḥ dvādaśa rāśayaḥ sat ṛtavaḥ dvādaśa

original: caturbhaginyaḥ nāvābhirūḍhāḥ bhrātṛpañcamāḥ salilavāsinaśceti saṃkṣe- pato mudrāsu vyavasthāpyā hi devatā anupūrvataśca dvipatayā śritāśca kāryā saṃkṣepato maṇḍalatraye pitṛmaṇḍalāśrayaḥ |
analyzed: catur bhaginyaḥ nāvā abhirūḍhāḥ bhrātṛ pañcamāḥ salila vāsinaḥ ca iti saṃkṣepataḥ mudrāsu vyavasthāpyāḥ hi devatāḥ anupūrvataḥ ca dvipa tayā śritāḥ ca kāryā saṃkṣepataḥ maṇḍala traye
abhilekhyaḥ caturaśraḥ ca
tri maṇḍaleṣu api vyavasthā sā eṣā bhavati
saṃkṣepataḥ buddhaḥ bhagavāna dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ
sarva sattvānām agre avaśyam abhilekhyaḥ
abjakule ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ dakṣiṇatas avaśyam abhilekhyaḥ
vajra kule vajrapāṇiḥ avaśyam abhi lekhyaḥ
bodhisattvānām agre ārya samantabhadraḥ vaśyam abhilekhyaḥ
mañju śrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ vaśyam abhilekhyaḥ
sā eṣā mudrāsu yathā vyavasthāyām abhi lekhyāḥ

original: etadabhyantaramaṇḍalaṃ madhyamaṇḍale'pi brahmā sahāmpatiḥ pūrvāyāṃ diśyavaśyamabhilikhitavyaḥ |
analyzed: etat abhyantara maṇḍalam madhya maṇḍale brahmā sahāmpatiḥ pūrvāyām diśi avaśyam abhilikhitavyaḥ

original: evamābhāsvaro dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi, akaniṣṭha arūpiṇaśca devā maṇḍalākārā avyaktāḥ naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanā devāḥ, uttarāyāṃ diśi śakro devarājā sayāmaḥ santuṣitaḥ sunirmitaḥ para- nirmitaḥ parīttābhaprabhṛtayo devaputrā avaśyamekaikaḥ devarājo'bhilikhi- tavyaḥ |
analyzed: evam ābhāsvaraḥ dakṣiṇāyām diśi akaniṣṭha arūpiṇaḥ ca devāḥ maṇḍala ākārāḥ avyaktāḥ na eva saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā āyatanāḥ devāḥ uttarāyām diśi śakraḥ devarājā sa yāmaḥ san tuṣitaḥ
sā eṣā mudrāsu vyavasthāpyāḥ

original: evaṃ tṛtīyamaṇḍale'pi uttarāyāṃ diśi īśāno bhūtādhipatiḥ sahomayāvaśyamabhilikhitavyaḥ |
analyzed: evam tṛtīya maṇḍale uttarāyām diśi īśānaḥ bhūta adhipatiḥ saha umayā avaśyam abhilikhitavyaḥ

original: dvitīyadvārasamīpe kārttikeya mañjuśrīḥ mayūrāsanaḥ śaktipāṇiḥ raktāvabhāsamūrttiḥ pītavastranivastottarāsaṅginaḥ dakṣiṇahaste ghaṇṭā patākāvasaktaḥ kumārarūpī maṇḍalaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ |
analyzed: dvitīya dvāra samīpe kārttikeya mañjuśrīḥ mayūrāsanaḥ śaktipāṇiḥ rakta avabhāsa mūrttiḥ dakṣiṇa haste ghaṇṭā patākā avasaktaḥ kumāra rūpī maṇḍalam nirīkṣamāṇaḥ

original: pūrvāyāṃ diśi vainateyaḥ pakṣirūpīna ṛṣirmārkaṇḍaḥ avaśyamabhilikhi- tavyaḥ |
analyzed: pūrvāyām diśi vainateyaḥ pakṣi rūpīnaḥ ṛṣiḥ mārkaṇḍaḥ avaśyam abhilikhi
sā eṣā mudrāsu ca vyavasthāpyāḥ

original: dakṣiṇapūrvataḥ catuḥkumāryāḥ kumārabhrātṛsahitā nauyānasaṃsthitā mahodadheḥ paribhramantyaḥ |
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pūrvatas catur kumāryāḥ kumāra bhrātṛ sahitāḥ nau yāna saṃsthitāḥ mahā udadheḥ paribhramantyaḥ
agniḥ ca deva rāj avaśya likhitavyaḥ

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi laṅkāpurī vibhīṣaṇaśca rākṣasādhipatiḥ, tatrasthitaḥ picumandavṛkṣāśritaḥ jambhalajalendranāmā yakṣarūpī bodhisattvo'vaśyama- bhilikhitavyaḥ ||
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām diśi laṅkā purī vibhīṣaṇaḥ ca rākṣasa adhipatiḥ tatra sthitaḥ picumanda vṛkṣa āśritaḥ jambhala jalendra nāmā yakṣa rūpī bodhisattvaḥ vaśyam abhilikhitavyaḥ
evam anupūrvatas yamaḥ preta mahardikaḥ vaśyam abhilikhitavyaḥ
evam piśāca rājā vikarālaḥ nāma avaśyam abhilikhitavyaḥ
sā eṣā mudrāsu vyavasthāpyā

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi nandopanandau nāgamukhyau avaśya mabhilikhitavyau |
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi nanda upanandau nāga mukhyau avaśyam abhilikhitavyau

original: grahamukhyaścādityaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi kapilamuni rnāma ṛṣivaro nirgrandhatītthaṃkaraṛṣabhaḥ nirgrandharūpī anupūrvataḥ |
analyzed: graha mukhyaḥ ca ādityaḥ paścimāyām diśi kapilamuniḥ rnāma ṛṣi varaḥ nirgrandhati itthaṃkara ṛṣabhaḥ nirgrandha rūpī anupūrvataḥ
sā eṣā mudrāsu vyavasthāpyāḥ

original: uttarapaścimāsu ca diśāsu yakṣarāḍ dhanadaḥ, manjuśrīmūlakalpe gandharvarād paścavaśikhaḥ, kinnararājā drumaḥ, ete'vaśyamabhilikhitavyāḥ |
analyzed: uttara paścimāsu ca diśāsu yakṣarāj dhanadaḥ manjuśrī mūla kalpe kinnara rājā drumaḥ ete vaśyam abhilikhitavyāḥ

original: saiṣā mudrāsu ca anupūrvataḥ yathāsthānaṃ saṃsthitā abhilikhitavyāḥ iti ||
analyzed: sā eṣā mudrāsu ca anupūrvataḥ yathāsthānam saṃsthitā abhilikhitavyāḥ iti

original: caturthamaṇḍalaṃ bahiḥ pañca rekhāḥ citaṃ mudramālābhiścopaśobhitaṃ caturaśraṃ catustoraṇākāraṃ caturmahārājavibhūṣitaṃ yathānupūrvasthitā tadyathā - mudrā bhavanti puraḥpradeśe nīlotpalamabhilekhyam |
analyzed: caturtha maṇḍalam bahis pañca rekhāḥ citam mudrā mālābhiḥ ca upaśobhitam caturaśram catur toraṇa ākāram catur mahārāja vibhūṣitam yathā anupūrva sthitā tat yathā mudrāḥ bhavanti puras
dakṣiṇatas vāmatas padmam vajram paraśu khaḍṅga śūla triśūla gadā cakra svastika kalaśa mīna śaṅkha kku

original: ṇḍaladhvajapatākaṃ pāśaghaṇṭākadvārakadhanurnārācamudgara etairvividhākāraprahara- ṇamudraḥ samantāccaturaśramālākulaṃ kuryādityataḥ bahiścaturdiśaṃ catvāro ma- hāsamudrāḥ sthāpanīyāḥ ||
analyzed: ṇḍala dhvaja patākam pāśa ghaṇṭāka dvāraka dhanuḥ nārāca mudgaraḥ etaiḥ vividha ākāra prahara mudraḥ samantāt caturaśra mālā ākulam kuryāt iti atas bahis caturdiśam catvāraḥ ma hā samudrāḥ

original: uttarāyāṃ diśi caturaśrākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā ubhayavatraṃ trisū- ghyākāraṃ samantajvālaṃ trikoṇākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpayet ||
analyzed: uttarāyām diśi caturaśra ākāram maṇḍalakam kṛtvā ubhaya vatram samanta jvālam tri koṇa ākāram maṇḍalakam kṛtvā sthāpayet

original: dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dhanvākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pātraṃ samantajvālaṃ sthāpayet |
analyzed: dakṣiṇāyām diśi dhanva ākāram maṇḍalakam kṛtvā pātram samanta jvālam sthāpayet

original: paścimāyāṃ diśi samantaprabhākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā nīlo- tpalaṃ sanālapatropetaṃ samantajvālaṃ vidikṣu ca catvāro mudrā bhavanti |
analyzed: paścimāyām diśi samantaprabhā ākāram maṇḍalakam kṛtvā nīla u tpalam sa nāla patra upetam samanta jvālam vidikṣu ca catvāraḥ mudrāḥ bhavanti

original: uttarapaścimāyāṃ diśi pāśaṃ vartulākāraṃ maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi dīrghākāramaṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā daṇḍaṃ samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi paraśuṃ samantajvālaṃ trikoṇākāraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pūrvottarāyāṃ diāśe khaḍgaṃ samantajvālaṃ sthāpayet ||
analyzed: uttara paścimāyām diśi pāśam vartula ākāram maṇḍalam kṛtvā samanta jvālam dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi dīrgha ākāra maṇḍalakam kṛtvā daṇḍam samanta jvālam dakṣiṇa paścimāyām diśi paraśum

original: ālikhya sarvata ityūrdhvamadhastiryak trīṇi mudrādvārasamaye bahi- rmaṇḍalasyālekhyāḥ cūrṇaireva tadyathā- vajravyajanopānahau ca samaṃnta- jvālinastvete abhilekhyā iti ||
analyzed: ālikhya sarvatas iti ūrdhvam adhas tiryak trīṇi mudrā dvāra samaye bahis maṇḍalasya ālekhyāḥ cūrṇaiḥ eva tat yathā vajra vyajana upānahau ca jvālinaḥ tu ete abhilekhyāḥ iti
etat maṇḍala vidhānam kathitam tu iha samāsatas
sattvānām hita kāmyā artha mañjughoṣeṇa dhīmatā

original: tato maṇḍalācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pūrvamevānugṛhītavyāḥ avikale- ndriyāḥ sarvāṅgaśobhanāḥ brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśudrāḥ utpāditabodhicittāḥ mahāyānayāyinaḥ itarayānāspṛhaṇaśīlā mahāsattvāḥ śraddhā kalyāṇadha- rmiṇaḥ mahārājyābhikāṃkṣiṇaḥ alpabhogajugupsanāḥ mahābhogābhiruci- dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ |
analyzed: tatas maṇḍala ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ pūrvam eva anugṛhītavyāḥ avikale indriyāḥ sarva aṅga śobhanāḥ brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśudrāḥ utpādita bodhi cittāḥ mahāyāna yāyinaḥ itara yāna āspṛhaṇa

original: tavantaḥ bhadrā vinītāḥ śīlavantaḥ bhikṣubhikṣaṇyupāsakopāsikā niya- masthā upoṣavopavāsasaṃvarasthāḥ mahābodhisattvādveṣiṇo mahāyakṣaḥkuḻī- nāḥ prakṛtyaiva dharmacāriṇaḥ ahorātroṣitā śucivastraprāvṛtāḥ sugandha- keśāḥ triḥsnāyinaḥ mauninaśca |
analyzed: tavantaḥ bhadrāḥ vinītāḥ śīlavantaḥ bhikṣu bhikṣaṇī upāsaka upāsikāḥ upoṣava upavāsa saṃvara sthāḥ mahā bodhisattvāḥ dveṣiṇaḥ prakṛtyā eva dharma cāriṇaḥ ahorātra uṣitāḥ śuci vastra

original: tadaho karpūrakuṅkumalavaṅgasugandhamukhaga- ndhinaḥ nityaṃ copaspṛśitavantaḥ kuśapiṇḍakopaviṣṭāḥ kṛtarakṣāvidhānāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ satyavantaḥ + + + + + + nmaṇḍala + + + + + nātyāsanne sthāpanīyāḥ |
analyzed: tat aho karpūra kuṅkuma lavaṅga sugandha mukha ga nityam ca upaspṛśitavantaḥ kuśa piṇḍaka upaviṣṭāḥ kṛta rakṣā vidhānāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ satyavantaḥ na ati āsanne sthāpanīyāḥ

original: śucinaḥ sucaukṣāḥ aṣṭānāṃ prabhṛti yāvadekaṃ nānyeṣām |
analyzed: śucinaḥ su caukṣāḥ aṣṭānām prabhṛti yāvat ekam na anyeṣām

original: te ca parasparāsaṃsaktinaḥ kṣatriyā mūrddhābhiṣiktāśca mahā- rājānaḥ |
analyzed: te ca paraspara asaṃsaktinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ mūrddhābhiṣiktāḥ ca mahāḥ rājānaḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca sutāḥ kumārakumārikāśca aviditagrāmyadharmāṇaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhagavān kumārarūpī mahābodhisattvo mañjuśrīḥ bālajanaprabo- dhakaḥ kumārakrīḍanaparaśca |
analyzed: teṣām ca sutāḥ kumāra kumārikāḥ ca avidita grāmya dharmāṇaḥ kāraṇam bhagavān kumāra rūpī mahā bodhisattvaḥ mañjuśrīḥ bāla jana prabodhakaḥ kumāra krīḍana paraḥ ca
atas prathamataraḥ eva kumāraḥ praveśayitavyaḥ

original: mahārājñābhivarddhana āyurārogyaiśvaryakāmaḥ bhogābhivarddhanaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ bālānāṃ mantrasiddhiḥ dhruvaṃ sthitā iti ||
analyzed: mahā rājñā abhivarddhanaḥ āyuḥ ārogya aiśvarya kāmaḥ bhoga abhivarddhanam ca viśeṣataḥ bālānām mantra siddhiḥ dhruvam sthitā iti

original: etāṃ pūrvasthāpitāṃ kṛtvā susastrāyopetā apramattāḥ tato maṇḍa- lācāryeṇa karpūradhūpaṃ dahatā pṛṣṭhato bahiniṃgantavyam |
analyzed: etām pūrva sthāpitām kṛtvā su sastrāya upetāḥ apramattāḥ tatas maṇḍa la ācāryeṇa karpūra dhūpam dahatā pṛṣṭhatas bahiniṃgantavyam

original: nirgatya ca ya- thāmmukhartukodakenāṣṭaśatābhimantritena mūlamantreṇa mahāmudrā pañcaśikha- sudritenodakena snātvā upaspṛśya ca śucirvastraprāvṛtena śucinā agni- kuṇḍaṃ gatvā kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ uttarapūrvābhimukhaḥ āhutīnāṃ karpūraku- kumacandanamiśrāṇāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt ||
analyzed: nirgatya ca yaḥ thāmmukha ṛtuka udakena aṣṭaśata abhimantritena mūlamantreṇa mahāmudrā pañcaśikha sudritena udakena snātvā upaspṛśya ca śuciḥ vastra prāvṛtena śucinā agni kuṇḍam gatvā kuśa

original: viśepataḥ tathāgatakule jātīkusumaṃ padma padmakule tathā kuvalayaṃ kuli- śapāṇe anyamantrebhyo itaramiti karpūradhūpaṃ tathāgatakule candanaṃ padma- kule tathā gugguluṃ guhyakendrasya vajriṇasyaiva śasyate |

original: tataḥ vitatavitānocchritadhvajapatākaśce- tacchatramūrdhani dhāryamāṇaḥ sitacāmare nivījyamānaḥ mahatā satkāreṇa nandīśabdanirghoṣaśaṅkhabherī mṛdaṅgajayaśabdaiḥ maṅgalagāthābhiḥ praśastasvasti- kagāthābhiśca jinabhāṣitairabhistūyamānaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca tanmaṇḍalaṃ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ praṇamya ācārya śirasā praṇamya, evaṃ ca vaktavyam va + + ṣyācāryasarvabuddhabodhisattvamantracaryānihīraṃ samanupraveṣṭuṃ sarvalaukikātikrāntarahasyavimokṣamaṇḍalaṃ samanupraveṣṭuṃ sarvadharmarājyasa- manupraveśabuddhatvamadhigantuṃ saṃkṣepato vaktavyaṃ buddho bhūyāmiti

original: tato svasthitaṃ mantraṃ yo yasya rocate bhūrjapatre gorocanayā likhitavyam

original: vaktavyaṃ anujñātastvaṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ bodhisattvaiśca maharddhikaiḥ sarvalaukikalokottarāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ likhanapaṭha- namaṇḍalopadeśamantratantramudrācaryānirdeśa svayaṃ carituṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ vā

original: pañcābhiṣekā dātavyā sarvebhyo pañca eva tu

original: caturthe āryavajrapāṇiḥ bāmahastavinyastavajraṃ kanakavarṇa sarvā- kaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ dakṣiṇahastoparuddhasaphalaṃ varadaṃ ca cārurūpiṇaṃ saumyada- caturthaḥ paṭalavirasaḥ

original: rśanaṃ hārārddhahāropaguṇṭhitadehaṃ muktāhāsyajñopavītaṃ ratnojjvalavicchu- ritamakuṭaṃ paṭṭacalananivastaṃ śvetapaṭṭāṃgukottarīyaṃ tathaivāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ samantabhadraṃ tīrthanivāsanottarāsaṅgadehaṃ ākārataśca yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭam ||
analyzed: hāra arddhahāra upaguṇṭhita deham muktā hāsya jñopavītam ratna ujjvala vicchurita makuṭam paṭṭa calana nivastam śveta paṭṭāṃguka uttarīyam tathā eva āryāvalokiteśvaram samantabhadram tīrtha

original: pañcamasmi tathā paḍhne āryamahāmatiḥ, ṣaṣṭhe śāntamatiḥ, saptame vairocanagarbhaḥ, aṣṭame apāyajahaśceti ||
analyzed: tathā ārya mahāmatiḥ ṣaṣṭhe śānta matiḥ saptame vairocana garbhaḥ aṣṭame
iti ete bodhisattvāḥ abhilekhyāḥ

original: phalapustakavinyastakapā- ṇayaḥ sarvālaṅkāranuśobhanāḥ paṭṭāṃgukottarīyāḥ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitāḥ pa- hṛcalanikānivastāḥ ||
analyzed: sarva alaṅkāra anuśobhanāḥ paṭṭāṃguka uttarīyāḥ sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitāḥ
teṣām ca upariṣṭaṭhāḥ aṣṭau pratyekabuddhāḥ abhilekhyāḥ

original: bhikṣuveṣadhā- riṃṇo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaśarīrāḥ raktakāṣāyavāsasā paryaṅkopaviṣṭāḥ ra- tnopalaniṣaṇṇāḥ śāntaveṣātmakāḥ samantajvālamālākulāḥ sugandhapu- ṣpāṇi kīrṇāḥ
analyzed: bhikṣu veṣa dhāḥ mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇa śarīrāḥ rakta kāṣāya vāsasā paryaṅka upaviṣṭāḥ ratna upala niṣaṇṇāḥ śānta veṣa ātmakāḥ samanta jvāla mālā ākulāḥ sugandha puṣpāṇi

original: tadyathā - mālatīvārṣikādhānuṣkārikāpunnāganā- gakesarādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ samantāt paṭamabhyavakīryamāṇaṃ likhitaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ vāmapārśve āryamañjuśriyasyopariṣṭāḥ anekaratnoparacitaṃ sudīrghākāraṃ vimānamaṇḍalaṃ śailarājopaśobhitaṃ ratnopalasañchannaparvatā- kāramabhilikhet ||
analyzed: tat yathā mālatī vārṣikā dhānuṣkārikā punnāga nāga kesara ādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ samantāt paṭam abhyavakīryamāṇam likhitam bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ vāma pārśve ārya mañjuśriyasya upariṣṭāḥ aneka
tatrasthām buddhām bhagavatām aṣṭau likhet

original: tadyathā - ratnāśa- khivaidūryaprabhāratnavicchuritasamantavyāmaprabhaṃ padmarāgendranīlamarakatādi- bhiḥ vaidūryāśmagarbhādibhiḥ mahāmaṇiratnaviśeṣaiḥ samantato prajvālyamāṇaṃ, īṣadādityodayavarṇa tathāgatavigrahaṃ pītacīvarottarāsaṅginaṃ paryaṅkopaviṣṭaṃ dharma deśayamānaṃ pītanivāsitoparivastaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇakavacitadehaṃ, agnītyānuvyañjanopaśobhitamūrtti praśāntadarśanaṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ ratna- śirkhi tathāgatamabhilikhet ||
analyzed: tat yathā padmarāga indranīla marakata ādibhiḥ vaidūrya aśmagarbha ādibhiḥ mahā maṇi ratna viśeṣaiḥ samantataḥ prajvālyamāṇam īṣat āditya udaya varṇa tathāgata vigraham pīta cīvara

original: dvitīyaṃ sakusumitarājendraṃ tathāgataṃ kanakavarṇa abhilikhet su- tarāṃ nāgakesaravakulādipuṣpairabhyavakīritamabhilikhe
analyzed: dvitīyam sa kusumita rāja indram tathāgatam kanakavarṇa abhilikhet su tarām nāgakesara vakula ādi puṣpaiḥ abhyavakīritam abhilikhe
āryam abhini rīkṣamāṇam samanta prabham ratna prabhā vicchurita dyoti paryeṣam
tṛtīyam śālendra rājam tathāgatam abhilikhet
padmākeñjalka ābha dharma deśayamānam
caturthe sunetram tathāgatam abhilikhet
yathā imam duḥprasaham
ṣaṣṭham vairocanam jinam
saptamam bhaiṣajya vaidūrya rājam
aṣṭamam sarva duḥkham a śamanam rāja indram tathāgatam abhilikhet iti

original: sarva eva kanakavarṇāḥ tathāgatavigrahāḥ kāryāḥ abhayapradāna- karāḥ
analyzed: sarve eva kanaka varṇāḥ tathāgata vigrahāḥ kāryāḥ abhaya pradāna karāḥ

original: upariṣṭācca tathāgatānāṃ meghāntarālasthāḥ paṭakoṇe ubhayataḥ puṣpavarṣamutsṛjamānāḥ dvau śuddhāvāsakāyikau devaputrau mabhilekhyau

analyzed: anta rīkṣa sthitau sarva buddha bodhisattva pratyekabuddha ārya śrāvakānām namasyamānau a abhilekhyau

original: divyamā- pratyekabuddhānāṃ cottarataḥ aṣṭau mahāśrāvakā abhilekhyāḥ bodhisa- ttvaśiraḥsthānāvavarajopaviṣṭāḥ
analyzed: divyamā pratyekabuddhānām ca uttaratas aṣṭau mahāśrāvakāḥ abhilekhyāḥ bodhisa śiraḥsthānau avaraja upaviṣṭāḥ

original: tadyathā - sthaviraśāriputraḥ mahāmauddha- lyāyanaḥ mahākāśyapaḥ subhūtiḥ rāhulaḥ nandaḥ bhadrikaḥ kaphiṇaveti ||
analyzed: tat yathā sthavira śāriputraḥ mahāmauddha lyāyanaḥ mahākāśyapaḥ subhūtiḥ rāhulaḥ nandaḥ bhadrikaḥ

original: pratyekabuddhāpi tadyathā - gandhamādanaḥ candanaḥ upariṣṭa- śvetasitaketunemisunemiceti
analyzed: pratyekabuddha api tat yathā gandhamādanaḥ candanaḥ śveta sitaketu nemi sunemi ceti

original: sarva eva suśobhanāḥ śāntaveṣaṃ ā tmano sudāntākārāḥ
analyzed: sarve eva su śobhanāḥ ā su dānta ākārāḥ

original: mahāśrāvakā api kṛtāñjalayo buddhaṃ bha- gavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: mahāśrāvakāḥ api kṛtāñjalayaḥ buddham bha gavantam śākyamunim nirīkṣamāṇāḥ

original: upariṣṭācca śuddhāvāsādeva sanni- kṛṣṭau aparau dvau devaputrau samantātpaṭṭavitānadīrghāpāyaśasobhanāgṛhītau sarvabuddhabodhisattvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāmupariṣṭāddhārayamāṇau lyāmbaradharau devaputrau abhilekhyau
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ca śuddha āvāsāt eva sanni kṛṣṭau aparau dvau deva putrau samantāt paṭṭa vitāna dīrgha apāyaśa sobhana āgṛhītau sarva buddha bodhisattva pratyekabuddha ārya śrāvakāṇām upariṣṭāt

original: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭānmū- rdhani muktāhāraratnapadmarāgendranīlādibhiḥ grathitaṃ ratnasūtrakalāpaṃ tasmiśca paṭṭavitānasuvinyastaṃ samantācca muktāhārapralambopaśobhitamabhilikhet
analyzed: bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upariṣṭāt mū rdhani muktā hāra ratna padmarāga indranīla ādibhiḥ grathitam ratna sūtra kalāpam tasmin ca paṭṭa vitāna su vinyastam samantāt ca muktā hāra pralamba upaśobhitam

original: adhaśca buddhasya bhagavataḥ padmāsanāt yamañjuśriyasya pādamūlasamīpe nāgarājopanandapārśve mahāratnaṃ parvataṃ padmaśarādabhyunnataṃ ratnāṅkaraguhāka- ndarapravālalatāpariveṣṭitaṃ ratnataruṃ maharṣayasiddhasevitaṃ tasya parvatasyo- tuṅge yamāntakaṃ krodharājānaṃ mahāghorarūpiṇaṃ pāśahastaṃ vāmahastagṛhīta- daṇḍaṃ bhṛkuṭivadanamājñāṃ pratīcchamānaḥ āryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiṃ dṛkodaraṃ ūrdhvakeśaṃ bhinnāñjanakṛṣṇameghasaṅkāśaṃ kapilaśmaśrudīrghakarālaṃ dīrghanakhaṃ raktalocanakaṃ sarpamaṇḍitakaṇṭhoddeśaṃ vyāghracarmanivasanaṃ sarvavighnaghātakaḥ mahādāruṇavaraṃ mahākrodharājānaṃ samantajvālaṃ yamāntakaṃ krodharājā a- bhilikhet ||
analyzed: adhas ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ padmāsanāt pāda mūla samīpe nāga rāja upananda pārśve mahāratnam parvatam padma śarāt abhyunnatam ratna aṅkara guhā kandara pravāla latā pariveṣṭitam ratna tarum vyāghra carma nivasanam sarva vighna ghātakaḥ mahā dāruṇa varam mahā krodha rājānam samantajvālam yama antakam krodha rājā a abhilikhet
caturthaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: tasya parvatasyādhastācchilātalopaniṣaṇṇaṃ pṛthivyāmavanatajānu- dehaṃ dhūpakaṭacchukavyagrahastaṃ yathāveṣasaṃsthānagṛhītaliṅgaṃ yathānuvṛttacarita- māryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiṃ sādhakamabhilikhe
analyzed: tasya parvatasya adhastāt śilā tala upaniṣaṇṇam pṛthivyām avanata jānu deham dhūpa kaṭacchuka vyagra hastam yathā veṣa saṃsthāna gṛhīta liṅgam yathā anuvṛtta carita mārya mañjuśriya gata

original: nandanāgendrarājasamīpaṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuneradhastāt, dakṣiṇapārśve padmasarābhyuṅgataṃ mahāratna- śailendrarājaṃ kathitaṃ tathāgatamabhilikhet
analyzed: nanda nāga indra rāja samīpam bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ adhastāt dakṣiṇa pārśve mahā ratna śaila indra rājam kathitam tathāgatam abhilikhet
yama antaka krodharāja rahitam abhilikhet
ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ syāt tam parvatam abhi likhet
tad uccatuṅga parvata padmarāga upalam tam eka aṅkura vaidūrya maya śṛṅga ākāram abhi likhet

original: tatrāpāśritāṃ devīmāryāvalokiteśvarakaruṇāṃ āryatārāṃ sarvāla- ṅkāravibhūṣitāṃ ratnapaṭṭāṃśukottarīyāṃ vicitrapaṭṭanivasanāṃ tryalaṅkārasarvā- ṅgavibhūṣitāṃ vāmahastanīlotpalavinyastāṃ kanakavarṇā kṛśodarīṃ nātika- śāṃ nātibālāṃ nātivṛddhāṃ dhyānagatacetanāṃ ājñāṃ pratīcchayantī dakṣi- ṇahastena varadādīṣidavanatakāyāṃ paryaṅkopaniṣaṇṇāṃ āryāvalokiteśvara īṣadapagatadṛṣṭiḥ samantajvālāmālaparyeṣitāṃ tatraiva vaidūryaratnaśṛṅge punnāga- vṛkṣapariveṣṭitaṃ sarvataḥ śākhāsu samantapuṣpoparacitavikasitasupuṣpitaṃ bhagavatīṃ tārāmabhicchādayamānāṃ tenaiva cāpagataśākhāsucitraṃ pravālāṅka rāvanaddhaṃ vicitrarūparaṅgojjvalaṃ tārādevīmukhāvalokanamabhilekhyā ||
analyzed: tatra apāśritām devīm ārya avalokiteśvara karuṇām ārya tārām sarva alaṅkāra vibhūṣitām ratna paṭṭa aṃśuka uttarīyām vicitra paṭṭa nivasanām tri alaṅkāra sarva aṅga vibhūṣitām vāma bhagavatīm tārām abhicchādayamānām tena eva ca apagata śākhāsu citram pravāla aṅka ra avanaddham vicitra rūpa raṅga ujjvalam tārā devī mukha avalokanam abhilekhyā
sarva vighna ghātakī devī uttamā bhaya nāśinī

original: sādhakasya tu rakṣārtha likhed varadāṃ śubhām ||
analyzed: sādhakasya tu rakṣā artha likhet vara dām śubhām
strī rūpa dhāriṇī devī karuṇā daśavala ātmajā
śreyasaḥ sarva bhūtānām likheta vara dāyikām
kumārasya iha mātā devī majjughoṣasya mahā dyuteḥ
sarva vighna vināśa artha sādhakasya tu samantāt
rakṣā artha manuja īśānām śreyasā artha paṭe nyaset
sau krodha rāja indraḥ parvata agre samavasthitaḥ
sarva vighna vināśāya kathitam jinavara ātmajaiḥ
mūla kalpe śāsane dviṣṭa sattvānām nigrahāya eva prakalpate
sādhakasya tu rakṣā artham sarva vighna vināśakaḥ
dāruṇaḥ roṣa śīlaḥ ca ākṛṣṭā mantradevatā
su ghoraḥ ghora rūpī ca niṣeddhā sarva nighṛṇām
avaśānām ca vaśam ānetā pāpa raudra pracāriṇām

original: khacare bhūcare vāpi pātāle cāpi samantataḥ ||
analyzed: kha care bhū care vā api pātāle ca api samantataḥ

original: nāśayati sarvaduṣṭānāṃ viruddhā ye śāsane mune
analyzed: nāśayati sarva duṣṭānām viruddhāḥ ye śāsane mune
caturaśram samantāt vai catur koṇam paṭam likhet
adhas ca eva paṭa ante tu vistīrṇa saritā ālayam
kuryāt nāgabhoga aṅkam aikaikam ca samantataḥ
śuklena śubha aṅgena manuja ākāra dehajāḥ
uttarā śirasam sthāpya kṛtāñjali puṣṭaḥ sadā

original: saptasphuṭo mahāvīryo maheśākhyo ananto nāma nāmataḥ
analyzed: saptasphuṭaḥ mahā vīryaḥ maheśa ākhyaḥ anantaḥ nāma nāmataḥ
tathāgatam nirīkṣantaḥ maṇi ratna upaśobhitaḥ
cāru rūpī ca ratna ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
ālikhet jvāla mālinam mahā nāga indra viśśrutam
sarva loka hitaḥ yuktam śāsane mune
sarva vighna vināśāya ālikhet saritā amṛtam
etat paṭa vidhānam tu uttamam jina bhāṣitam
saṃkṣipta vistara ākhyātam pūrvam uktam tathāgataiḥ

original: ālikhe yo hi vidvāṃ vai tasya puṇyamanantakam
analyzed: ālikhe yaḥ hi vidvān vai tasya puṇyam anantakam

original: yat kṛtaṃ kalpakoṭībhiḥ pāpaṃ karma sudāruṇam ||
analyzed: yat kṛtam kalpa koṭībhiḥ pāpam karma su dāruṇam

original: naśyate tatkṣaṇādeva paṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bhūtale
analyzed: naśyate tad kṣaṇāt eva paṭam dṛṣṭvā tu bhū tale
pañca ānantarya kāriṇam duḥśīlām jugupsitām
sarva pāpa pravṛttānām saṃsāra andhāra cāriṇām
gati yoni nikṛṣṭānām paṭam teṣām na vārayet
caturthaḥ paṭala visaraḥ
darśanam saphalam teṣām paṭam maunīndra bhāṣitam
dṛṣṭa mātram pramucyante tasmāt pāpāt tu tad kṣaṇāt
kim punar śuddha vṛtti tvāt
mantra siddhau sadā udyuktoḥ siddhim lapseyuḥ mānavaḥ

original: yat puṇyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ pūjayitvā kalpakoṭi ye
analyzed: yat puṇyam sarva sattvānām pūjayitvā
tat puṇyam prāpnuyāt mantrī paṭam ālikhanāt bhuvi

original: sikatā yāni gaṅgāyāḥ pramāṇe yāni kīttitā
analyzed: sikatā yāni gaṅgāyāḥ pramāṇe yāni kīttitā
tad pramāṇāḥ bhavet buddhāḥ pratyeka jina vara ātmajāḥ

original: khaṅginaḥ sādhakā loke jitvā bahudhā punaḥ
analyzed: khaṅginaḥ sādhakāḥ loke jitvā bahudhā punar
tat phalam prāpnuyāt paṭa āla khana darśanā
vācanāt eva pūjanā vā api anumodanā
mantra siddhiḥ bhuvā tasya sarva karme prakalpitāḥ

original: yāvanti laukikā mantrāḥ bhāṣitā ye jinapuṅgavaiḥ
analyzed: yāvanti laukikāḥ mantrāḥ bhāṣitāḥ ye jinapuṅgavaiḥ
tad śiṣya khaṅgibhiḥ divyaiḥ

original: siddhacante sarvamantrā vaiḥ parasyāgra tu magratamiti ||
analyzed: siddha cante sarva mantrāḥ tu tu
bodhisattva piṭaka avataṃsakāt mahāyāna sūtrāt manjuśrī mūla kalpāt caturthaḥ
prathama paṭa vidhāna visaraḥ parisamāptaḥ
paścamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃśchākyamuniḥ sarva tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayeta sma
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarva tat parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam āmantrayeta sma

original: asti manjuśrīḥ aparamapi tvadīyaṃ madhyamaṃ paṭavidhānam
analyzed: asti manjuśrīḥ aparam api tvadīyam madhyamam paṭa vidhānam
tat bhāṣiṣye ham
śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭu
ca manasi kuru

original: ādau tāvat pūrvanirdiṣṭenaiva sūtrakeṇa pūrvoktenaiva vidhinā pūrva- parikalpitaiḥ śilpibhiḥ pūrvapramāṇaiva madhyamapaṭaḥ suśobhanena śuklena suvratena sadaśena aśleṣakairaṅgairapagatakeśasaṅkārādibhiryathaiva prathamaṃ tathaiva tat kuryāt varjayitvā tu pramāṇarūpakāt tatparaṃ paścādabhilikhāpayi- tavyam ||
analyzed: ādau tāvat pūrva nirdiṣṭena eva sūtrakeṇa pūrva uktena eva vidhinā pūrva parikalpitaiḥ śilpibhiḥ pūrva pramāṇā eva madhyama paṭaḥ su śobhanena śuklena suvratena sa daśena aśleṣakaiḥ aṅgaiḥ

original: ādau tāvat śuddhāvāsabhavanaṃ samantaśobhanākāraṃ sphuṭitaratna- mayākāraṃ sitamuktāhārabhūpitaṃ tasmi madhye bhagavāṃśchākyamuniḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ ratnasiṃhāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ dharma deśayamānaḥ sarvākāra- varopetaḥ, dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśrīḥ padmakiñjalkābhaḥ kuṅkumāditya- varṇo vā vāmaskandhapradeśe nīlotpalāvasaktaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ īṣatprahasitavadanaḥ kumārarūpī pañcacīrakopa- śobhitaśiraskaḥ bāladārakālaṅkārabhūṣitaḥ dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalāvanata- śiraḥ bhagavataśca śākyamunervāmapārśve āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ śaratkā- ṇḍagauro yathaiva pūrva tathaivamabhilekhyam |
analyzed: ādau tāvat śuddha āvāsa bhavanam samanta śobhana ākāram sphuṭita ratna maya ākāram sita muktā hāra bhūpitam tasmin madhye bhagavān śākyamuniḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ ratna siṃhāsana upaniṣaṇṇaḥ śākyamuneḥ vāma pārśve ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ śaratkā ṇḍa gauraḥ yathā eva tathā evam abhilekhyam

original: kintu bhagavataścāmaramuddhya- mānaṃ tasya pārśve āryamaitreyaṃ samantabhadraḥ vajrapāṇirmahāmatiḥ śā- ntamati gaganagañjaḥ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhinaśceti |
analyzed: kintu tasya pārśve ārya maitreyam samantabhadraḥ vajrapāṇiḥ mahāmatiḥ gaganagañjaḥ sarva nīvaraṇa viṣkambhinaḥ ca iti
ete nupūrvatas bhi lekhyāḥ
yathā eva prathamam tathā eva sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitāḥ citrāpayitavyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ copariṣṭā aṣṭau buddhā bhagavantaścitrāpayivyāḥ sthitakā a bhayapradānadakṣiṇakarāḥ pītacīvarottarāsaṅgīkṛtadehāṃḥ vāmahastena cīvara- kargakāvasaktā īṣadraktāvabhāsakāṣāyasunivastāḥ samantaprabhāḥ sa- bīkāravaropetāḥ, tadyathā - saṅkusumitarājendrastathāgataḥ ratna- śikhiḥ śikhiḥ viśvabhuk kakutsandakabakagrānaḥ kāśyapaḥ sunetra ceti |
analyzed: teṣām ca upariṣṭāḥ aṣṭau buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ sthitakāḥ a bhaya pradāna dakṣiṇa karāḥ vāma hastena vāma hastena samanta prabhāḥ sa bīkāra vara upetāḥ tat yathā saṅkusumita rāja indraḥ
iti ete buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ citrāpayitavyāḥ
pañcamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavata āryamañjuśriyasya samīpe mahāparṣanmaṇḍalaṃ citrāpayitavyam |
analyzed: dakṣiṇe pārśve bhagavataḥ ārya mañjuśriyasya samīpe mahā parṣad maṇḍalam citrāpayitavyam

original: aṣṭau mahāśrāvakāḥ aṣṭau pratyekabuddhāḥ yathaiva pūrva tathaiva te citrāpayitavyāḥ |
analyzed: aṣṭau mahāśrāvakāḥ aṣṭau pratyekabuddhāḥ yathā eva tathā eva te citrāpayitavyāḥ

original: kintu āryamahāmaudgalyāyanaśāriputrau bhagavataḥ śākyamune cāmaramuḍūyamānau sthitakāyamabhilekhyau |
analyzed: kintu ārya mahāmaudgalyāyana śāriputrau bhagavataḥ śākyamune cāmaram uḍūyamānau sthita kāyam abhilekhyau

original: śakraśca devānāmindraḥ sa- yāmaśca santuṣitaśca sunirmitaśca śuddhaśca vimalaśca sudṛśaśca atapaśca ābhāsvaraśca brahmā ca sahāmpatiḥ akaniṣṭhaśca evamādayo devaputrā rūpāvacarāḥ kāmāvacarāścānupūrvato'bhilekhyāḥ āryamañjuśriyasamī- pasthāḥ parṣanmaṇḍaloparicitavinyastāḥ svarūpaveṣadhāriṇo citrāpayi- tavyāḥ |
analyzed: śakraḥ ca devānām indraḥ sa yāmaḥ ca santuṣitaḥ ca sunirmitaḥ ca śuddhaḥ ca vimalaḥ ca sudṛśaḥ ca atapaḥ ca ābhāsvaraḥ ca brahmā ca sahāmpatiḥ akaniṣṭhaḥ ca evamādayaḥ deva putrāḥ

original: bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanasyādhastātsamantānmahāparvataḥ mahāsamudrā- bhyudgataṃ yāvat paṭānte citrāpayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanasya adhastāt samantāt mahā parvataḥ mahā samudra abhyudgatam yāvat paṭa ante citrāpayitavyaḥ

original: ekasmin paṭāntakoṇe sā- dhako yathāveṣasaṃsthānākāraḥ avanatajānukaurparaśiraḥ dhūpakaṭacchuka- vyagrahastaḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ |
analyzed: ekasmin paṭa anta koṇe yathā veṣa saṃsthāna ākāraḥ avanata jānu kaurpara śiraḥ dhūpa kaṭacchuka vyagra hastaḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ

original: tasmiśca ratnaparvate āryamañjuśriyasyādha- stāt yamāntakakrodharājā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭamabhilekhyam |
analyzed: tasmin ca ratna parvate ārya mañjuśriyasya adhas stāt yamāntaka krodha rājā yathāpūrva nirdiṣṭam abhilekhyam

original: vāmapārśva bha- gavataḥ siṃhāsanasyādhastād āryāvalokiteśvarapādamūlasamīpe tasmiśca ratnaparvatopaniṣaṇṇā tārādevī abhilekhyāḥ |
analyzed: vāma pārśva bha gavataḥ siṃhāsanasya adhastāt ārya avalokiteśvara pāda mūla samīpe tasmin ca ratna parvata upaniṣaṇṇā tārādevī abhilekhyāḥ
yathā pūrva nirdiṣṭā tathā citrāpayitavyāḥ

original: samantāśca tatpaṭaṃ muktapuṣpāvakīrṇa campakanīlotpa- lasaugandhikamālatīvarṣikadhānuṣkārīkapunnāgakesarādibhiḥ puṣpairabhya- vakīrṇa samantāt paṭam |
analyzed: samantāt ca tat paṭam mukta puṣpa avakīrṇa campaka nīlotpala saugandhika mālatī varṣika dhānuṣkārīka punnāga kesara ādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ abhya avakīrṇa samantāt paṭam

original: upariṣṭācca paṭāntakoṇe ubhayānte dvau deva- putrau mahāpuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau vicitrarūpadhāriṇau antarīkṣasthitau vā- rimeghāntargatanilīnau utpatamānau sitavarṇau abhilekhyāviti ||
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ca paṭa anta koṇe ubhaya ante dvau deva putrau mahā puṣpa ogham utsṛjamānau vicitra rūpa dhāriṇau antarīkṣa sthitau vā ri megha antargata nilīnau utpatamānau sita varṇau
etat madhyamakam proktam paṭaḥ śreyārtham udbhavam
madhya siddhiḥ tad āyattā manujānām tu bhū tale

original: yatkiñcit kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ saṃsāre saṃsarato purā |
analyzed: yat kiñcid kṛtam pāpam saṃsāre purā
naśyate tad kṣaṇāt eva paṭam darśanāt iha

original: mūḍhasattvā tvā na jānanti bhramanvā gatipañcake |
analyzed: tvā na jānanti bhraman vā gati pañcake

original: paṭasyā darśanā ye tu mañjughoṣasya madhyame ||
analyzed: darśanāḥ ye tu mañjughoṣasya madhyame

original: mañjuśrīmūlakalpe api kilbiṣakārī syāt pañcānantaryakāriṇaḥ duḥśīlasyāpi sidhyeyurmantrā vividhabhāṣitāḥ ||
analyzed: mañjuśrī mūla kalpe api kilbiṣa kārī syāt pañca ānantarya kāriṇaḥ duḥśīlasya api sidhyeyuḥ mantrāḥ vividha bhāṣitāḥ

original: api kṣiprataraṃ siddhi prāpnuyāt kṛtajāpinaḥ rogī mucyate rogāi daridro labhate dhanam ||
analyzed: api kṣiprataram siddhi prāpnuyāt kṛta jāpinaḥ rogī mucyate daridraḥ labhate dhanam
aputraḥ labhate putram madhyame paṭa darśane

original: dṛṣṭamātraṃ tadā puṇyaṃ prāpnuyād vipulaṃ mahat ||
analyzed: dṛṣṭa mātram tadā puṇyam prāpnuyāt vipulam mahat

original: niyataṃ devamanuṣyāṇaṃ saukhyabhāgī bhavennaraḥ buddhatvaṃ niyataṃ tasya janmānte ca bhaviṣyati ||
analyzed: niyatam deva manuṣyāṇam saukhya bhāgī bhavet naraḥ buddha tvam niyatam tasya janma ante ca bhaviṣyati
likhanā vācanāt ca eva tathā
sparśanāt ca eva mucyate sarva kilbiṣāt

original: prārthanādhyeṣaṇā hovaṃ paṭasyāsya mahādyuteḥ labhate saphalaṃ janmāṃ kṣipraṃ cānumodanā ||
analyzed: prārthanā adhyeṣaṇā paṭasya asya mahā dyuteḥ labhate saphalam kṣipram ca anumodanā

original: na śakyaṃ vācayā vaktumapi kalpāgrakoṭibhiḥ yat puṇyaṃ prāpnuyā jantu saphalaṃ paṭadarśanāditi ||
analyzed: na śakyam vācayā vaktum api kalpa agra koṭibhiḥ yat puṇyam jantu saphalam paṭa darśanāt iti
bodhisattva piṭaka avataṃsakāt mahāyāna vaipulya sūtrāt ārya manjuśriya mūla kalpāt pañcamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ
dvitīyaḥ paṭa vidhāna visaraḥ samāptaḥ

original: ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūta- māmantrayate sma |
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhaḥ paṭala visaraḥ atha khalu bhagavām śākyamuniḥ punar api mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūta māmantrayate sma

original: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparamapi paṭavidhānarahasyaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kanyasaṃ nāma |
analyzed: asti mañjuśrīḥ aparam api paṭa vidhāna rahasyam tṛtīyam kanyasam nāma
yaḥ sarva sattvānām ayatnena eva siddhim gaccheyuḥ

original: pūrvarvānirdi- ṣṭhenaiva vidhinā śilpibhiḥ sugatavitastipramāṇaṃ tiryak tathaiva samaṃ ca- turaśraṃ pūrvavat paṭaścitrāpayitavyaḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairaṅgaiḥ ||
analyzed: vidhinā śilpibhiḥ sugata vitasti pramāṇam tiryak tathā eva samam ca turaśram pūrvavat paṭaḥ citrāpayitavyaḥ pūrva nirdiṣṭaiḥ aṅgaiḥ

original: | ādau tāvadāryamanjuśrīḥ siṃhāsanopaniṣaṇṇaḥ bāladārakarūpī pūrvavat dharma deśayamānaḥ samantaprabhā arciṣo nirgacchamānaścārurūpī citrāpayitavyaḥ ||
analyzed: ādau tāvat ārya manjuśrīḥ siṃhāsana upaniṣaṇṇaḥ bāla dāraka rūpī pūrvavat dharma deśayamānaḥ samanta prabhāḥ arciṣaḥ nirgacchamānaḥ cāru rūpī citrāpayitavyaḥ

original: vāmapārśve āryasamantabhadraḥ ratnopalasthitaḥ camaravyagrahastaḥ cintāmaṇivāmavinyastakaraḥ priyaṅguśyāmavarṇaḥ pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ ||
analyzed: vāma pārśve ārya samantabhadraḥ ratnopala sthitaḥ camara vyagra hastaḥ cintāmaṇi vāma vinyasta karaḥ priyaṅgu śyāma varṇaḥ pūrvavat citrāpayitavyaḥ

original: dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśriyasya ratnopalasthitaḥ āryāvaloki- teśvaraḥ pūrvavat |
analyzed: dakṣiṇa pārśve ārya mañjuśriyasya ratnopala sthitaḥ ārya avaloki teśvaraḥ pūrvavat

original: adhaśca siṃhāsanāt kanakavarṇaḥ parvato yāvat paṭānte citrāpa- yitavyaḥ |
analyzed: adhas ca siṃhāsanāt kanakavarṇaḥ parvataḥ yāvat paṭānte citrāpaḥ yitavyaḥ

original: paṭāntakoṇasya āryamañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanasyādhastād dakṣiṇapārśve yamāntakaḥ krodharājā pūrvavaccitrāpayitavyaḥ dhūpakaṭacchu- kavyagrahastaḥ yathāpūrva tathaiva sādhakaḥ |
analyzed: paṭa anta koṇasya ārya mañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanasya adhastāt dakṣiṇa pārśve yama antakaḥ krodha rājā pūrvavat citrāpayitavyaḥ ka vyagra hastaḥ yathāpūrva tathā eva sādhakaḥ

original: upariṣṭādāryamañjuśriyasya saḥ kusumitarājendrastathāgatacitrāpayitavyaḥ ṣoḍaśāṅgulapramāṇaḥ ratnapa- rvataguhālīnaḥ|
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ārya mañjuśriyasya saḥ kusumita rāja indraḥ tathāgata citrāpayitavyaḥ ṣoḍaśa aṅgula pramāṇaḥ ratna parvata guhā līnaḥ
kūṭāgāra sadṛśāḥ prāgbhāra parvatāḥ daśa citrāpayitavyāḥ

original: upariṣṭācca paṭakoṇāva- sthitau parvataprāgbhārasaṃśliṣṭau utpatamānavimānapuṣpaughamutsṛjamānau śu- dāvāsakāyikau devaputrau śuddhava nāma viśuddhaśca nāma pūrvavaścitrāpa- yitavyau ||

original: yat kṛtaṃ kāritaṃ cāpi pāpaṃ karma sudāruṇam |

original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanād bhagavantaṃ śākya- muniṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya, bhagavataścaraṇayornipatya, bhagavantamevamāha - “sādhu sādhu bhagavatā yastathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena subhāṣi- to'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvavidyāvratacāriṇāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānu- kampāyai bodhisattvānāmupāyakauśalyatā darśitā nirvāṇoparigāminī varmopaviśeṣā niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇā santatirbodhisattvānāṃ sarvamantrā- rthacaryāsādhanīyametanmantrarahasyasarvajanavistāraṇakarī bhaviṣyatyanāgate 'dhvani nirvṛte lokagurau astamite tathāgatādityaṃ vaṃśe riścite sarva- buddhakṣetre sarvabuddhabodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ andhakārībhūte lokabhā- jane, vicchinne āryamārge, sarvavidyāmantroṣadhimaṇiratnopagate sādhujana- parihīṇe nirāloke sattvadhātau sattvā bhaviṣyanti kusīdā naṣṭaspṛhatayā aśrāddhāḥ khaṇḍakā akalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāḥ śaṭhāḥ māyāvino dhūrtaca- ritāḥ
analyzed: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ utthāya āsanāt bhagavantam śākya munim tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ caraṇayoḥ nipatya bhagavantam evam āha sādhu sādhu bhagavatā yaḥ tathāgatena arhatā lokagurau astamite tathāgata ādityam vaṃśe riścite sarva buddhakṣetre sarva buddha bodhisattva ārya śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ andhakārībhūte loka bhā jane vicchinne ārya mārge sarva vidyā mantra

original: te imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā ca satrāsamāpatsyante
analyzed: te imam dharmaparyāyam śrutvā ca satrāsam āpatsyante

original: tvadīyaṣamantrāḥ ṣaḍakṣarāḥ mahāprabhāvāḥ tulyasamavīryāḥ paramahṛdayāḥ paramāsaddhāḥ buddhamivotpannāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya sarvabuddhaiḥ samprabhāṣitāḥ samayagrastāḥ sampracalitāḥ sarvakarmikāḥ bodhimārgānu deśakāḥ, tathāgatakule mantrapravarāḥ uttamamadhyametaratṛdhāsamprayuktāḥ suśobhanaṃ karmaphalavipākapradāḥ śāsanāntardhānakālasamayasiddhiṃ yāsya- nti
analyzed: tvadīya ṣa mantrāḥ ṣaṣ akṣarāḥ mahā prabhāvāḥ tulya sama vīryāḥ parama hṛdayāḥ parama āsaddhāḥ buddham iva utpannāḥ sarva sattvānām arthāya sarva buddhaiḥ samprabhāṣitāḥ samaya grastāḥ

original: samavaśaraṇaṃ saddharmanetrārakṣaṇārtha ye sādhayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ mūlyapra- yogeṇaiva mahārājyamahābhogaiśvaryārtha te sādhayiṣyanti
analyzed: samavaśaraṇam saddharma netra ārakṣaṇa artha ye sādhayiṣyanti teṣām mūlya pra yogeṇa eva mahā rājya mahā bhoga aiśvarya artha te sādhayiṣyanti

original: teṣāṃ kṣiprataraṃ tasmi kāle tasmi samaye siddhiṃ yāsyanti
analyzed: teṣām kṣiprataram tasmi kāle tasmin samaye siddhim yāsyanti

original: antato jijñāsanaheto- rapi sādhanīyā hyete paramahṛdayāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyante, tathā tathā siddhiṃ yāsyanti samāsataḥ
analyzed: antatas jijñāsana hetoḥ sādhanīyāḥ hi ete parama hṛdayāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyante tathā tathā siddhim yāsyanti samāsatas

original: eṣāṃ paṭavidhānaṃ bhavati tasmi kāle tasmi samaye mahābhairave paścakaṣāye sattvā alpapuṇyā bhavi- ṣyanti
analyzed: eṣām paṭa vidhānam bhavati tasmi kāle tasmi samaye mahābhairave paśca kaṣāye sattvāḥ alpa puṇyāḥ

original: alpeśākhyāḥ alpajīvinaḥ alpabhogāḥ mandīryā na śakya- nte ativistarataraṃ paṭavidhānādīni karmārmāṇi prārabhantum
analyzed: alpeśākhyāḥ alpa jīvinaḥ alpa bhogāḥ mandīryāḥ na śakya nte ati vistarataram paṭa vidhāna ādīni karma armāṇi prārabhantum
teṣām arthāya bhāṣiṣye saṃkṣiptataram

original: ādau tāvad vikrayeṇa sūtrakaṃ krītvā, palamātramardhapalamātraṃ vā, hastamātraṃ dīrghatvena ardhahastamātraṃ tiryakkarpaṭaṃ sadanaṃ tantuvāyena vāyayitavyam

original: apagatakeśamanyaṃ vā navaṃ karpaṭakhaṇḍaṃ pratyagramata ūrdhva yathepsataḥ dvihastacaturhastaṃ vā pad pañca daśa cāṣṭaṃ vā suśuklaṃ gṛhya yathepsataḥ citrakareṇa citrāpayitavyam
analyzed: apagata keśam anyam vā navam karpaṭa khaṇḍam pratyagram atas ūrdhva yathā īpsataḥ dvi hasta catur hastam vā pad pañca daśa ca aṣṭam vā su śuklam gṛhya yathā īpsataḥ citrakareṇa

original: aśleṣakairaṅgaiḥ candanakarpūrakuṅ‌kumasitaiḥ paṭaṃ candanakuṅkumakarpūraṃ caikīkṛtya, niṣprāṇakenodake niḥkaluṣenā- loḍya nave bhāṇḍe paṭaṃ plāvayitvā, divasatrayaṃ supidhānaṃ pathi taṃ sthāpayet
analyzed: aśleṣakaiḥ aṅgaiḥ candana karpūra kuṅ sitaiḥ paṭam candana kuṅkuma karpūram ca ekīkṛtya niṣprāṇakena udake niḥkaluṣena ā loḍya nave bhāṇḍe paṭam plāvayitvā divasa trayam supidhānam

original: kṛtarakṣāṃ śucau deśe ātmanaḥ śucirbhūtvā, śuklapakṣe pūrṇamāsyāṃ paṭabhā- ṇḍasyāgrataḥ pūrvābhimukhaḥ kuśaviṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ ime mantrapadāḥ aṣṭaśata- vāramuccārayitavyāḥ
analyzed: kṛta rakṣām śucau deśe ātmanaḥ śuciḥ bhūtvā śukla pakṣe pūrṇamāsyām paṭabhā ṇḍasya agratas pūrva abhimukhaḥ kuśa viṇḍaka upaviṣṭaḥ ime mantra padāḥ aṣṭaśata vāram uccārayitavyāḥ
tat yathā om he he bhagavan

original: bahurūpadharaḥ di- vyacakṣuṣe avalokaya avalokaya māṃ samayamanusmara kumārarūpa- saptamaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ
analyzed: bahu rūpa dharaḥ avalokaya avalokaya mām samayam anusmara saptamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

kim cirāyasi
hū hū phaṭ phaṭ svāhā
anena mantreṇa kṛta jāpaḥ tatra eva svapet

original: tatotthāya avilambitasiddhinimittaṃ svapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ paṭaṃ li khāpayet, na cedasiddhinimittāni svamāni dṛśyante
analyzed: tatas utthāya avilambita siddhi nimittam svapnam dṛṣṭvā tam paṭam khāpayet na ced asiddhi nimittāni svamāni dṛśyante

original: tat paṭaṃ ta- smād bhāṇḍāduddhṛtya ātape śoṣayet
analyzed: tat paṭam smāt bhāṇḍāt uddhṛtya ātape śoṣayet

original: śoṣayitvā ca bhūyaḥ anye nave bhāṇḍe nyaset
analyzed: śoṣayitvā ca bhūyas anye nave bhāṇḍe nyaset
sa guptam ca kṛta rakṣam ca sthāpayet

original: tato bhūyo teṣāṃ para- mahṛdayānā anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhatviā, yatheṣṭataḥ ṣaḍakṣarāṇāṃ bhūyo akṣaralakṣaṃ japet
analyzed: tatas bhūyas teṣām anyatamam mantram yatheṣṭataḥ ṣaḍakṣarāṇām bhūyas akṣara lakṣam japet
āśu tat paṭam sidhyati iti

original: ādau tāvat taṃ paṭaṃ gṛhya prātihārakaple anye vā śukle'hani śu- bhanakṣatrasaṃyukte śubhāyāṃ tithau śuklapakṣadivase vā suśobhanaiḥ śakunaiḥ maṅgalasammatāyāṃ rātrau ardharātrakālasamaye upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa taṃ paṭaṃ citrāpayet śucau pradeśe karpūradhūpaṃ dahatā
analyzed: ādau tāvat tam paṭam gṛhya anye vā śukle hani anye vā śukle hani anye vā śukle hani anye vā śukle hani śu bha nakṣatra saṃyukte śubhāyām tithau śukla pakṣa divase vā su śobhanaiḥ

original: ādau tāvadāryamañjuśriyaṃ bāladārakākāraṃ pañcacīrakaśiraskaṃ bālālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ kanakavarṇa nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivasitaṃ nīlapaṭṭāṃ- śukottarīyaṃ dharma deśayamānaṃ siṃhāsane ardhaparyaṅkopaviṣṭadakṣiṇacaraṇaṃ ratnapādapīṭhasthaṃ sthāpitasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ sarvālaṅkāropetaṃ cārudarśanaṃ ī- ṣasmitamukhaṃ sādhakagatadṛṣṭiṃ citrāpayet
analyzed: ādau tāvat ārya mañjuśriyam bāla dāraka ākāram pañca cīraka śiraskam bāla alaṅkāra bhūṣitam kanaka varṇa nīla paṭṭa calanikā nivasitam nīla paṭṭām śuka uttarīyam dharma deśayamānam

original: dakṣiṇe pārśve āryasamantabhadraṃ sitacāmaroḍūyamānaṃ priyaṅguśyāmaṃ vāmahastacintāmaṇivinyastaṃ sarvāṅgaśobhanaṃ sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitaṃ nīlapaṭṭa- calanikānivastaṃ muktāhārayajñopavītaṃ sikataṃ śvetapadmāsanasthaṃ citrā payitavyam
analyzed: dakṣiṇe pārśve ārya samantabhadram sita cāmara uḍūyamānam priyaṅgu śyāmam vāma hasta cintāmaṇi vinyastam sarva aṅga śobhanam sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣitam muktā hāra yajñopavītam sikatam

original: āryamanjuśriyasya vāmapārśve āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ nīlapaṭṭaca- lanikānivastaḥ sarvāṅgaśobhanaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ muktāhārayajño- pavītaḥ vāmahaste cetapadmavinyastaḥ dakṣiṇahaste sitoḍūyamānacamaraḥ
analyzed: ārya manjuśriyasya vāma pārśve ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ sarva aṅga śobhanaḥ sarva alaṅkāra vibhūṣitaḥ muktā hāra yajña upavītaḥ vāma haste dakṣiṇa haste sita uḍūyamāna camaraḥ

original: hemadaṇḍavinyastaḥ saumyākāraḥ āryamañjuśriyagatadṛṣṭiḥ tathaivāryasama- ntabhadraḥ śvetapadmāsanasthau ubhāvapyetau abhilekhyau ||
analyzed: hema daṇḍa vinyastaḥ saumya ākāraḥ ārya mañjuśriya gata dṛṣṭiḥ tathā eva ārya sama ntabhadraḥ śveta padmāsana sthau ubhau api etau abhilekhyau
mañjuśrī mūla kalpe eka padma viṭapa utthitau trīṇi padmāni

original: madhyame mūlapadmakarṇikā- yāmāryamañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanaṃ ratnapīṭhaṃ ca |
analyzed: madhyame mūla padma karṇikā yām ārya mañjuśriyasya siṃhāsanam ratna pīṭham ca

original: aparasmi padye āryasa- mantabhadraḥ, tṛtīye padma āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ |
analyzed: padye ārya sa mantabhadraḥ tṛtīye padme ārya avalokiteśvaraḥ

original: śobhanaṃ ca tat padmadaṇḍe marakatapadmākāraṃ anekapadmapuṣpamukulitaṃ patropetaṃ vikasitārdhavikasita- puṣpamahāsarānavataptotthitaṃ dvau nāgarājāvaṣṭabdhanābhaṃ nandopanandasa- ndhāritaṃ tat padmadaṇḍaṃ sitavarṇā ca tau nāgarājānau saptasphaṭāvaṃbhū- ṣitau sarvālaṅkāraśobhitaśarīrau manuṣyārthakāyau ahibhogāṅkitamūrtaya āryamañjuśriyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇau jalāntārthanilīnau maṇiratnopaśobhita- cchadau likhāpayitavyau ||
analyzed: śobhanam ca tat padma daṇḍe marakata padma ākāram aneka padma puṣpa mukulitam patra upetam vikasita ardha vikasita puṣpa mahā sarā anavatapta utthitam dvau nāga rāja avaṣṭabdha nābham nanda

original: samantācca mahāsaraṃ adhastāt sādhakaḥ dakṣiṇapārśve paṭānta- koṇe āryamañjuśriyasya vakramaṇḍalaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo dhūpakaṭacchakavyagra- hastaḥ avanataśirakoparajānukāyaḥ yathā veṣavarṇataḥ, tathāmabhilekhyam ||
analyzed: samantāt ca mahā saram adhastāt sādhakaḥ dakṣiṇa pārśve paṭa anta koṇe ārya mañjuśriyasya vakra maṇḍalam nirīkṣamāṇaḥ dhūpa kaṭacchaka vyagra hastaḥ avanata śiraka upara jānukāyaḥ

original: upariṣṭādāryamañjuśriyasya ubhau paṭāntakoṇābhyāṃ dvau devaputrau mālādhāriṇau puṣpamālāggṛhītau utpatamānau meghāntārnalīnau mahāpu- ṣpaughamutsṛjamānau suśobhanau abhilekhyau ||
analyzed: upariṣṭāt ārya mañjuśriyasya ubhau paṭa anta koṇābhyām dvau devaputrau mālā dhāriṇau puṣpa mālā ggṛhītau utpatamānau megha anta arna līnau mahā pu pu ogham utsṛjamānau su śobhanau abhilekhyau

original: samantācca tatpadaṃ nāgakesarādibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ prakiritamabhili- khet |

original: āryamañjuśrīḥ dharma deśayamānaḥ āryasamantabhadraḥ āryāvalokiteśvaraścamaravinya- stapāṇayo. likhāpayitavyāḥ |

original: yathābhirucitakaṃ vā sādhakasya trīṇi rūpakāṇi avaśyaṃ likhāpayitavyāni |
analyzed: yathā abhirucitakam vā sādhakasya trīṇi rūpakāṇi avaśyam likhāpayitavyāni

original: yatheṣṭākārā vā yathāsaṃsthāna- saṃsthitā vā sādhakasya yathā yathā rocate tathā tathā likhita- vyāni ||
analyzed: yathā iṣṭa ākārā vā yathā saṃsthāna saṃsthitā vā sādhakasya yathā yathā rocate tathā tathā likhita vyāni

original: madhye ca āryamañjuśrīḥ, ubhayānte ca āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ, samantabhadraśca yaṃthepsitaḥ anya avaśyaṃ likhāpayitavyāni |

original: yathālabdhe vā karpaṭakhaṇḍe vitastihastamātre vā ātmanā vā pareṇa vā citra- kareṇa popadhikena vā apoṣadhikena vā śraddhena vā aśrāddhena vā śucinā vā aśucinā vā śīlavatena vā duḥśīlena vā citrakareṇa likhāpayitavyaḥ ||
analyzed: yathālabdhe vā karpaṭa khaṇḍe vitasti hasta mātre vā ātmanā vā pareṇa vā citra kareṇa popadhikena vā apoṣadhikena vā śraddhena vā aśrāddhena vā śucinā vā aśucinā vā śīlavatena vā duḥśīlena

original: ātmanā sādhakena avaśyaṃ kṛtapuraścaraṇena śrāddhena utpāditabo- dhicittana avaśyaṃ bhavitavyamiti ||

original: evaṃ sidhyanti mantrā vai nānyeṣāṃ pāpakāriṇām |

original: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena yānti vināyakāḥ ||
analyzed: śraddhā hi paramam yānam yena yānti vināyakāḥ

analyzed: śrāddhe sthitasya martyasya boddhāram hi karmaṇā

original: sarvamantrā viśeṣataḥ, laukikā devatā ye'pi ye'pi lokocarā tathā ||

original: paṭaḥ svalpo viśeṣo vā madhyamo parikīrtitaḥ ||
analyzed: paṭaḥ su alpaḥ viśeṣaḥ vā parikīrtitaḥ

original: bodhisattvapiṭakānmahāyānavaipulyasūtrādāryamañju- śriyamūlakalpāt saptamaḥ paṭakavisarāt caturthaḥ paṭavidhānapaṭalavisaraḥ parisamāpta iti ||
analyzed: bodhisattva piṭakāt mahāyāna vaipulya sūtrāt ārya mañju śriya mūla kalpāt saptamaḥ paṭaka visarāt caturthaḥ paṭa vidhāna paṭala visaraḥ parisamāptaḥ iti

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃśchākyamunirmañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantraya- te sma |

analyzed: tvayā nirdiṣṭā sattvā teṣām arthāya idam paṭavi dhānam visaram ākhyātam

original: teṣāma- rthāya sādhanopayikaṃ guṇavistāraprabhedavibhāgaśo karmavibhāgaṃ samanubhā- ṣiṣyāmi |

analyzed: tam śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca kuru bhāṣiṣye

atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat

tat vadatu tam bhagavān

asmākam anukampā artham

original: atha bhagavāṃśchākyamuniḥ sarvāvantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya smi- tamakārṣīt |
analyzed: atha bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvantam parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya smi tam akārṣīt

original: atha bhagavataḥ śākyamunermukhadvārāt nīlapītasphaṭikava- rṇādayo raśmayo niścaranti sma |
analyzed: atha bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ mukha dvārāt nīla pīta sphaṭika va rṇa ādayaḥ raśmayaḥ niścaranti sma

original: samanantaraniścaritā ca raśmayo sarvā- vantaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalaṃ avabhāsya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ sarvamāra- bhavanaṃ jihmīkṛtya sarvanakṣatradyotiśailagaṇaprabhāṃ yatremau candrasūryo maha- rthikau mahānubhāvau tayā prabhayā te'pi jihmīkṛtau nāvabhāsyante, ni- pprabhāṇi ca bhavanti |
analyzed: samanantara niścaritā ca raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ parṣad maṇḍalam avabhāsya tri sāhasra mahā sāhasram lokadhātum bhavanam jihmīkṛtya sarva nakṣatra dyoti śaila gaṇa prabhām yatra imau candra sūryaḥ

original: na virocante jihmīkṛtāni ca sandṛśyante sarva- maṇimantrauṣadhiratnaprabhāṃ niḥprabhīkṛtya punareva bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ mukhadvārāntardhīyate sma ||

original: atha khalu vajrapāṇivarbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatraiva parṣanmaṇḍale sannipatito'bhūt |
analyzed: atha khalu vajrapāṇi var bodhisattvaḥ mahāsattvaḥ tatra eva parṣad maṇḍale sannipatitaḥ bhūt

analyzed: ādau tāvat yatra pratiṣṭhitā sarva matra caryā sādhana karmāṇi avandhyāni bhavanti sa phalāni
āśu ca sarva mantra caryā sādhana karmāṇi avandhyāni bhavanti sa phalāni
āśu ca sarva mantra prayogāni siddhim gacchanti
katamam ca tat
bhāṣiṣye haṃ śṛṇu kumāra

original: ādau tāvad vidyāvrataśīlacaryāsamādānaṃ prathamata eva samāda- det
analyzed: ādau tāvat vidyā vrata śīla caryā samādānam prathamatas eva
