original: tvadīyaṃ kalparājoktaṃ vyaktaṃ medhāvinaṃ labdhvācāryābhiṣekatvaṃ śāsanābhiśaṃ kuśalaṃ vyaktaṃ dhārmikaṃ satyavādinaṃ mahotsāhaṃ kṛtajñaṃ dṛḍhasauhṛdaṃ nāti- vṛddhaṃ nātibālaṃ nispṛhaṃ sarvalābhasatkāreṣu brahmacāriṇaṃ kāruṇikaṃ na lobhamātreṇa bhogahetorvā anunayahetorvā na mṛṣāṃ vadate kaḥ punarvādo svalpamātraiṇaiva lobhamohaprakāraiḥ dṛḍhapratijñā samatā sarvabhūteṣu dayāvāṃ dānaśīlaḥ kṛtapuraścaraṇaḥ tvadīyaguhyamantrānujāpī pūrvasevakṛtavidyaḥ tva- dīyamaṇḍalasamanupūrvapraviṣṭaḥ lokajñaḥ vidhijñaḥ samanugrāhakaḥ kāryā- vāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ śreyasapravṛttaḥ abhīru acchambhinamamaṅkabhūtaḥ dṛḍha- vīryaḥ avyādhitaḥ yena vyādhinā akarmaśīlī mahoccakulaprasūta- ceti
analyzed: tvadīyam kalparāja uktam vyaktam medhāvinam labdhvā ācārya abhiṣeka tvam kuśalam vyaktam dhārmikam satya vādinam mahā utsāham kṛtajñam dṛḍha sauhṛdam na ati vṛddham na ati bālam nispṛham sarva samanugrāhakaḥ vām vicakṣaṇaḥ śreyasa pravṛttaḥ dṛḍha vīryaḥ avyādhitaḥ yena vyādhinā akarma śīlī mahā ucca kula prasūta ca iti
ebhiḥ guṇaiḥ yuktaḥ maṇḍalācāryaḥ bhavati

original: sādhakaśca tatsamaḥ nyūno vā kiṃñcidaṅgaiḥ tādṛśaṃ maṇḍalācārya- mabhyarthya prārthayet
analyzed: sādhakaḥ ca tad samaḥ nyūnaḥ vā kiṃñcid aṅgaiḥ tādṛśam maṇḍala ācāryam abhyarthya prārthayet

original: icchāmyācāryeṇa mahābodhisattvasya kumārabhūta- mañjuśrīmūlakalpe syāryamañjuśriyasya samayamanupraviṣṭum
analyzed: icchāmi ācāryeṇa mahā bodhisattvasya kumāra bhūta mañjuśrī mūla kalpe sya ārya mañjuśriyasya samayam anupraviṣṭum
tat vadatu ācāryaḥ smāka manukampā artha hita cittaḥ dayāvān

original: tatastena maṇḍalācāryeṇa pūrvanirdiṣṭena vidhinā śiṣyāṃ yathā- pūrva parīkṣya praveśayet
analyzed: tatas tena maṇḍala ācāryeṇa pūrva nirdiṣṭena vidhinā śiṣyām yathā parīkṣya praveśayet
pūrvavat abhiṣekam dattvā mantram dadyāt
yathāvat kramaśas samayam darśayet

original: rahasyatantramudrāmanukarmāṇi ca prabhūtakālenaiva suparīkṣya āśayaṃ jñātvā darśayet
analyzed: rahasya tantra mudrām anukarmāṇi ca prabhūta kālena eva su parīkṣya āśayam jñātvā darśayet

original: sarvatantramantrādiṣu karmāṇi nā- nyeṣāmiti vidhireṣā prakīrttitā
analyzed: sarva tantra mantra ādiṣu karmāṇi nā nyeṣām iti vidhiḥ eṣā prakīrttitā

original: tataḥ śiṣyeṇa maṇḍalācāryasya yathāśaktitaḥ ācāryo vā yena tuṣyeta, ātmānaṃ bhogāṃśca pratipādayet
analyzed: tatas śiṣyeṇa maṇḍala ācāryasya yathāśaktitaḥ ācāryaḥ vā yena tuṣyeta ātmānam bhogān ca pratipādayet
tatas tena maṇḍala ācāryeṇa putra saṃjñā upasthāpayitavyā
putra vat pratipattavyam
mātuḥ ca bhogāḥ upasaṃhartavyāḥ iti

original: tatastena sādhakena anyatamaṃ mantraṃ gṛhītvā ekāntaṃ gatvā pūrva- nirdiṣṭe sthāne peyālaṃ taireva mantraiḥ āhvānanavisarjanapradīpagandhadhūpa- balinibedyaṃ maṇḍaloktena vidhinā vistareṇa karttavyam
analyzed: tatas tena sādhakena anyatamam mantram gṛhītvā ekāntam gatvā nirdiṣṭe sthāne peyālam taiḥ eva mantraiḥ āhvānana visarjana pradīpa gandha dhūpa bali nibedyam maṇḍala uktena vidhinā vistareṇa karttavyam

original: āhūya a- rghamāsanaṃ dattvā trisandhyā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī jāpaṃ kuryāt pratyahaṃ tatra sandhyākālaṃ nāma rātryantāt prabhṛti yāvad yugamātrādi- tyodayam
analyzed: āhūya a rgham āsanam dattvā tri sandhyā tri snāyī tri caila parivartī jāpam kuryāt pratyaham tatra sandhyā kālam nāma rātri antāt prabhṛti yāvat yuga mātra ādi
atra antare prathamam sandhyam ucyate

original: madhyandine ca āditye ubhayānte yugamātraṃ pramāṇaṃ vyomnni sanniśritaṃ ravimaṇḍalaṃ madhyaṃ sandhyamucyate
analyzed: madhyandine ca āditye ubhaya ante yuga mātram pramāṇam vyomni sat niśritam ravi maṇḍalam madhyam sandhyam ucyate
astamana kāle ca yuga mātra śeṣam tritīyam sandhyam ucyata
iti
śīla vrata samāyuktam ācārya dakṣa paṇḍitam
ca dṛḍha vīrya tu sarvatas
mantra tantra abhiyuktam ca sarva kāryeṣu dakṣa dhīḥ
sūkṣmaḥ nipuṇa mantra jñaḥ sadā
mahā utsāhī ca tejasvī loka dharma anupekṣiṇaḥ
smi laukikānām tu varjitāḥ
kṛta jāpī pūrva sevā anusevinaḥ
mantra jñaḥ mañjughoṣasya dṛṣṭa pratyaya tatparaḥ
ekādaśaḥ paṭala visaraḥ
laukikānām prayoga jñaḥ matrāṇām buddha bhāṣitām
kṛta rakṣaḥ śauca ācāra rataḥ sadā
buddha upadeśitam mārgam anuvartī ca sarvatas
udyuktaḥ mantra jāpe smi praśaste jina vaṇite
dṛṣṭa karma phale nityam para loke tathā eva ca
bhīruḥ syāt sarva pāpānām aṇu mātram tathā eva ca
medhāvī priya darśanaḥ
daśa balaiḥ kathitāḥ mantrāḥ tathā eva jina mūnubhiḥ

original: laukikā ye ca mantrā vai bajjrāntakulayorapi |
analyzed: laukikāḥ ye ca mantrāḥ vai bajjra anta kulayoḥ api
teṣām kṛta śramaḥ nityam grantha śāstra artha dhārakāḥ
a vyādhitaḥ na śaktiṣṭhaḥ
āśukārī tu sarvatas
adīrghasūtrī tathā mānī iṅgita jñaḥ viśeṣataḥ
brahmacāri ekākī cara saṅga kṛt
labdha abhiṣekaḥ śuraḥ ca tatre smin mañju bhāṣite
tathā eva ca
śreyasāya eva prayuktaḥ ca dātā bhūta hite rataḥ

original: tathā viśiṣṭo ācāryo prārthanīyo sadā tu vai |
analyzed: tathā viśiṣṭaḥ ācāryaḥ prārthanīyaḥ sadā tu vai
likhitam tena mantrāṇām maṇḍalam siddhim archati

original: abhiṣekaṃ tu tenaivaṃ dattaṃ bhavati mahat phalam |
analyzed: abhiṣekam tu tena evam dattam bhavati mahat phalam
siddhi kāmaḥ tu śiṣyaiḥ vā pūjyaḥ sau muni vat sadā

original: alaṅghayaṃ tasya vacanaṃ śiṣyaiḥ kartavya yatnataḥ |
analyzed: alaṅghayam tasya vacanam śiṣyaiḥ kartavya yatnataḥ
bhogāḥ tasya dātavyāḥ yathā vibhava sambhavāḥ

original: svalpamātrā prabhūtā vā yena vā tuṣṭi gacchati |
analyzed: su alpa mātrā prabhūtā vā yena vā tuṣṭi gacchati
kāya jīvita hetu artham cittam deham yathā pituḥ

original: mūlakalpe tathaiva śiṣyo dharmajño ācāryāya dade dhanam |
analyzed: mūlakalpe tathā eva śiṣyaḥ dharma jñaḥ ācāryāya dade dhanam

original: puṣkalaṃ gatimāpnoti śiṣyo pūjyastu taṃ gurum |
analyzed: puṣkalam gatim āpnoti pūjyaḥ tu tam gurum
mantrāḥ tasya ca sidhyanti vidhi mārga upadarśanāt
sevanāt bhajanāt teṣām mānanā pūjanāt api

original: sarve devāstu tuṣyante satkriyā tu gurau sadā |
analyzed: sarve devāḥ tu tuṣyante satkriyā tu gurau sadā

original: samayānupraveśināṃ pūrva prathamaṃ vā sādhakena tu |
analyzed: samaya anupraveśinām prathamam vā sādhakena tu

original: jano vā tatsamo vāpi utkṛṣṭo vā bhaved yadi ||
analyzed: janaḥ vā tad samaḥ vā api utkṛṣṭaḥ vā bhavet yadi

original: tenāpi tasya tantre'smi upadeśaḥ sadā tu vai ||
analyzed: tena api tasya tantre smi upadeśaḥ sadā tu vai

original: na matsaro bhavet tatra śiṣye'smi pūrvanirmite ||
analyzed: na matsaraḥ bhavet tatra śiṣye smi pūrva nirmite

original: snigdhasantānānudharā nu mantraṃ dadyāttu tatra vai ||
analyzed: nu mantram dadyāt tu tatra vai

analyzed: śiṣyam evam tu śiṣyaḥ vā guru darśane

original: teṣāṃ nityaṃ tu mārga vai mantracaryānudarśane |
analyzed: teṣām nityam tu mārga vai mantra caryā anudarśane

original: dhṛtiṃ tuṣṭiṃ ca lebhe tau tathā śiṣya guruḥ sadā |
analyzed: dhṛtim tuṣṭim ca lebhe tau tathā śiṣya guruḥ sadā
rakṣaṇīyaḥ prayatnena putraḥ dharma vatsalaḥ sadā
avyavaccheda buddhānām dharmatā bhavati teṣu vai

daridrebhyaḥ ca sattvebhyaḥ klīvebhyaḥ viśeṣataḥ

sarvakāḥ e kurvīta adhama uttama madhyame

īpsitebhyaḥ pi pradātavyam gati yoniḥ viceṣṭiteḥ

original: śiṣyeṇaiva tu tasmai tu mantraṃ gṛhya yathātamam ||

original: pitṛvat praṇamya śirasā vainato gacche yetheṣṭataḥ |

original: mahāraṇyaṃ parvatāgraṃ tu nadīkūle śucau tathā ||
analyzed: mahā araṇyam parvata agram tu nadī kūle śucau tathā
goṣṭhe mahā pure ca api vivikte
śūnya devakule vṛkṣe ekaline śiloccaye

etaiḥ ca anyaiḥ pradeśaiḥ tu japet mantram samāhitaḥ

iṅgita ākāra tattva jñaiḥ ātma sama sādṛśaiḥ
śuraiḥ vijita saṅgāyaiḥ sāttvikaiḥ ca sahiṣṇubhiḥ

original: prātarutthāya śayanāt snātvā caitra śuce jale ||
analyzed: prātar utthāya śayanāt snātvā caitra śuce jale

original: mantrapūrta tato kṛtvā jalaṃ caukṣaṃ sanirmalam |

original: tatotthāya taṭe sthitvā hastau prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ |

analyzed: caturthe rātri bhāge tu tad artha ardhe eva tu

original: ato vyomne diteḥ bhānoḥ mantrajāpaṃ tadā tyajet
analyzed: atas vyomne diteḥ bhānoḥ mantra jāpam tadā tyajet

original: rañjanīyaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ śabdāṃstu vai śubhām
analyzed: rañjanīyam tathā dṛṣṭvā rūpam śabdān tu vai śubhām

original: bāliśā yatra mūḍhā vai bhramanti gatipañcake
analyzed: bāliśāḥ yatra mūḍhāḥ vai bhramanti gati pañcake

viparīta dhiyaḥ yatra saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ

dīrgha dolā abhirūḍhāḥ tu gamana āgamaneṣu ca īkṣitāḥ

original: sīdanti ciramadhvānaṃ yatra sattvā śuce ratāḥ
analyzed: sīdanti ciram adhvānam yatra sattvāḥ śuce ratāḥ

original: na kṣayaṃ janma teṣāṃ vai duḥkhavārisamaplutām
analyzed: na kṣayam janma teṣām vai duḥkha vāri samaplutām

original: duḥkhamūlaṃ tathā dyukto striyā buddhaistu kevaḻaḥ
analyzed: duḥkha mūlam tathā striyāḥ buddhaiḥ tu

original: narakaṃ tiryalokaṃ ca metalokaṃ ca sāsuram
analyzed: narakam tiryalokam ca meta lokam ca sa asuram

original: śrīmūlakalpe bhuñjīta gatvā deśe tu kalpikaṃ + + + + + śucau deśe tu saṃsthāpya bhikṣābhājanaśuddhadhīḥ
analyzed: śrī mūla kalpe bhuñjīta gatvā deśe tu kalpikam śucau deśe tu saṃsthāpya bhikṣā bhājana śuddha dhīḥ

original: || pādau prakṣālya bahirgatvā tasmādāvasathāt punaḥ | niḥprāṇake tadā ambhe prathamaṃ jaṅghameva tu
analyzed: pādau prakṣālya bahis gatvā tasmāt āvasathāt punar niḥprāṇake tadā ambhe prathamam jaṅgham eva tu

original: || dvitīya vāmahastena jaṅgaṃ cāśliṣya cāghṛṣe | apasavyaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā hastaṃ prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ
analyzed: vāma hastena jaṅgam ca āśliṣya ca āghṛṣe apasavyam punar kṛtvā hastam prakṣālya mṛttikaiḥ

original: || pūrvasaṃsthāpitaiḥ śuddhaiḥ śucibhiḥ sapta eva tu | mantrapūtaṃ tato caukṣaṃ śucinirmalabhājane
analyzed: pūrva saṃsthāpitaiḥ śuddhaiḥ śucibhiḥ sapta eva tu mantra pūtam caukṣam śuci nirmala bhājane

original: || gṛhya gomayasudyaṃ tu kapilāgaupariśrute | niṣprāṇakāmbhasaṃyukte kuryā śāsturmaṇḍamaṇḍalam
analyzed: tu tu kapila gau pariśrute niṣprāṇaka ambha saṃyukte kuryā śāstuḥ maṇḍa maṇḍalam

original: || prathamaṃ munivare kuryāt hastamātraṃ viśeṣataḥ | dvitīyaṃ sumantranāthasya tṛtīyaṃ kuladevate
analyzed: prathamam munivare kuryāt hasta mātram viśeṣataḥ dvitīyam sumantra nāthasya tṛtīyam kuladevate

original: || ya jāpino yadā mantrī tat kuryāttu sadā punaḥ | caturthe sarvasattvānāmupabhogaṃ tu kīrtyate
analyzed: jāpinaḥ yadā mantrī tat kuryāt tu sadā punar caturthe sarva sattvānām upabhogam tu kīrtyate

original: || dakṣiṇe lokanāthasya maṇḍale tu sadā iha | ratnatrayāya kuryāttaṃ maṇḍalaṃ caturaśrakam
analyzed: dakṣiṇe lokanāthasya maṇḍale tu sadā iha ratna trayāya kuryāt tam maṇḍalam caturaśrakam

original: || dvitīyaṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ daśabalātmajaiḥ | ityete maṇḍalāḥ sapta caturaśrā samantataḥ
analyzed: dvitīyam pratyekabuddhānām tṛtīyam daśabala ātmajaiḥ iti ete maṇḍalāḥ sapta caturaśrā samantataḥ

original: || hastamātrārdhahastaṃ vā kuryā cāpi dine dine | gupte deśe tadā jāpī pratyahaṃ pāpanāśanā
analyzed: hasta mātra ardha hastam vā kuryāḥ ca api dine dine gupte deśe tadā jāpī pratyaham pāpa nāśanā

original: || tatotthāya punarmantrī hastau prakṣālya yatnataḥ | upaspṛśya jale caukṣe śuddhe prāṇakavarjite
analyzed: tatas utthāya punar mantrī hastau prakṣālya yatnatas upaspṛśya jale caukṣe śuddhe prāṇaka varjite

original: || nirmale śucine yatnāt śucibhāṇḍe tadāhṛte | mahāsare mastravaṇe vāpi audbhave saritāṭate
analyzed: nirmale śucine yatnāt śuci bhāṇḍe tad āhṛte mahā sare mastravaṇe vā api audbhave saritā aṭate

original: || śucideśasamāyāte śucisatvakaroddhṛte | upaspṛśya punarmantrī dve trayo vā sadā punaḥ
analyzed: śuci deśa samāyāte śuci sattva kara uddhṛte upaspṛśya punar mantrī dve trayaḥ vā sadā punar

original: || āmṛśeta tato vaktraṃ karṇaśrautrau tathaiva ca | + + + + + + + + akṣṇau nāsāpuṭau bhujo
analyzed: āmṛśeta tatas vaktram karṇa śrautrau tathā eva ca akṣṇau nāsā puṭau bhujo

original: || ekādaśaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ | mūrdhina nābhideśe ca saṃspṛśet śubhavāriṇā
analyzed: ekādaśaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ nābhi deśe ca saṃspṛśet śubha vāriṇā

original: bārāṃ pañcasaptaṃ vā kuryāt sarva yathāvidhim
analyzed: pañca saptam vā kuryāt yathāvidhim

original: || śaucācārasampanno śucirbhūtvā tu jāpinaḥ | bhikṣābhājanamādāya gacchet salilālayam
analyzed: śauca ācāra sampannaḥ śuciḥ bhūtvā tu jāpinaḥ bhikṣā bhājanam ādāya gacchet salilālayam

original: || yatra pratiṣṭhitā vāri nimnnagā codbhave tathā | nadīprasravaṇādibhyo bhikṣāṃ prakṣālayet sadā
analyzed: yatra pratiṣṭhitā vāri nimnnagā ca udbhave tathā nadī prasravaṇa ādibhyaḥ bhikṣām prakṣālayet sadā

original: || tatotthāya punargacche vihāramāvasathaṃ tu vai | pūrvasanniśrito yatra vaśe tatra tu taṃ vrajet
analyzed: tatas utthāya punar gacche vihāram āvasatham tu vai pūrva sat niśritaḥ yatra vaśe tatra tu tam vrajet

original: || gatvā taṃ tu vai deśaṃ nyaset pātraṃ taṃ japī | upaspṛśya tataḥ kṣipraṃ gṛhya pātraṃ tathā punaḥ
analyzed: gatvā tam tu vai deśam nyaset pātram tam japī upaspṛśya tatas kṣipram gṛhya pātram tathā punar

original: || pātre mṛnmaye parṇe rājate hemnna eva vā | tāmre valkale vāpi dadyāt śāsturnivedanam
analyzed: pātre mṛd maye parṇe rājate hemnnaḥ eva vā tāmre valkale vā api dadyāt śāstuḥ nivedanam

original: || nivedyaṃ śāstuno dadyāt svamantraṃ mantrarād punaḥ | ekaṃ tithimāgamya duḥkhitebhyo'pi śaktitaḥ
analyzed: nivedyam śāstunaḥ dadyāt sva mantram mantrarāt punar ekam tithim āgamya śaktitaḥ

original: || nātiprabhūtaṃ dātavyaṃ nivedyaṃ caiva sarvataḥ | nātmānupāyā mantrajño kuryād yuktā tu sarvataḥ
analyzed: na ati prabhūtam dātavyam nivedyam ca eva sarvatas na ātma anupāyā kuryāt yuktā tu sarvatas

original: ||| kukṣimātrapramāṇaṃ tu sthāpyamānaṃ dadau sadā | na bubhukṣāpipāsārttā śakto mantrārthasādhane
analyzed: kukṣi mātra pramāṇam tu sthāpyamānam dadau sadā na bubhukṣā pipāsā ārttā śaktaḥ mantra artha sādhane

original: || nātyāśī malpabhojī vā śakto mantrānuvartane | ata eva jinendreṇa kathitaṃ sarvadehinām
|| āhārasthitisattvānāṃ yena jīvanti mānuṣāḥ | devāsuragandharvanāgayakṣāca kinarāḥ
analyzed: āhāra sthiti sattvānām yena jīvanti mānuṣāḥ deva asura gandharva nāga yakṣāḥ ca kinarāḥ

original: || rākṣasāḥ pretapiśācāśca bhūtostārakasagrahāḥ | nāsau saṃvidyate kaścid bhājane yo'vahitapeokṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: rākṣasāḥ preta piśācāḥ ca na asau saṃvidyate kaścid bhājane yaḥ vahitapeokṣiṇaḥ

original: || audārikamākārakavaḍīkāhāraśca kīrtitāḥ | sūkṣmāhārikasattvā vai ityuvāca tathāgataḥ
analyzed: audārikam ākāraka vaḍīka āhāraḥ ca kīrtitāḥ sūkṣma āhārika sattvāḥ vai iti uvāca tathāgataḥ

original: ||| dhyānāhāriṇo divyāḥ rūpāvacaraceṣṭitāḥ | ārūpyātha devā vai samādhiphalabhojinaḥ
analyzed: dhyāna āhāriṇaḥ divyāḥ rūpāvacara ceṣṭitāḥ ārūpya atha devāḥ vai samādhi phala bhojinaḥ

original: || -- śrīmūlakalpe antarābhavasattvāśca gatvāhārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ | kāmadhātau tathā sattvā vicitrāhārabhojanāḥ
analyzed: śrī mūlakalpe antarābhava sattvāḥ ca gatvā āhārāḥ prakīrtitāḥ kāmadhātau tathā sattvāḥ vicitra āhāra bhojanāḥ

original: || kāmiko'suramartyānāṃ kabalikāhārabhojanāḥ | ata eva jinendraistu kathitaṃ dharmahetubhiḥ
analyzed: sura martyānām atas eva jinendraiḥ tu kathitam dharma hetubhiḥ

original: || āhārasthiti sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca prakīrtitā | jāpino nityayuktastu mātrā eva bhujakriyā
analyzed: sattvānām sarveṣām ca prakīrtitā jāpinaḥ nitya yuktaḥ tu mātrāḥ eva bhuja kriyā

original: || śakto hi sevituṃ mantrā bhojane'smi pratiṣṭhitaḥ | ācārapariśuddhastu kuśalo brahmacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: śaktaḥ hi sevitum mantrāḥ bhojane smi pratiṣṭhitaḥ ācāra pariśuddhaḥ tu kuśalaḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: || mātrajñatā ca bhaktesmi siddhistasya na durlabhā | yathaivākṣapabhyajya śākaṭī śakaṭasya tu
analyzed: mātra jña tā ca siddhiḥ tasya na durlabhā śākaṭī śakaṭasya tu

original: || cirakālābhisthityarthe bhārodvahanahetavaḥ | tathaiva mantrī mantrajño āhāraṃ sthitaye dadau
analyzed: cira kāla abhisthiti arthe bhāra udvahana hetavaḥ tathā eva mantrī mantra jñaḥ āhāram sthitaye dadau

original: || kallevarasya yāpyayāvyarthe poṣayeta sadā japī | mantrāṇāṃ sādhanārthāya bodhisambhārakāraṇā
analyzed: kallevarasya yāpyayā avyarthe poṣayeta sadā japī mantrāṇām sādhana arthāya bodhi sambhāra kāraṇā

original: || japenmantraṃ tathā marye lokānugrahakāraṇāt | ata eva muniḥ śreṣṭho ityuvāca mahādyutiḥ
analyzed: japet mantram tathā marye loka anugraha kāraṇāt atas eva muniḥ iti uvāca mahā dyutiḥ

original: || kāśyapo nāma nāmena purā tasmi sadā bhuvi | śreyasārthe hi bhūtānāṃ idaṃ mantraṃ prabhāṣata
analyzed: kāśyapaḥ nāma nāmena purā sadā bhuvi śreyasā arthe hi bhūtānām idam mantram prabhāṣata

original: || duḥkhināṃ sarvalokānāṃ dīnāṃ dāridrayakhedinām | āyāsoparatāṃ kliṣṭāṃ teṣāmarthāya bhāṣitam
analyzed: duḥkhinām sarva lokānām dīnām dāridraya khedinām āyāsa uparatām kliṣṭām teṣām arthāya bhāṣitam

original: || śreyasāyaiva bhūtānāṃ saṃsṛtānāṃ tathā punaḥ | āhārārthe tu bhūtānāṃ idaṃ mantravaraṃ vadet
analyzed: śreyasāya eva bhūtānām saṃsṛtānām tathā punar āhāra arthe tu bhūtānām idam mantra varam vadet

original: || bhṛṇvantu śrāvakāḥ sarve bodhisaniśritāśca ye | mahodaṃ vacanaṃ mantraṃ gṛhṇa tvaṃ vyādhināśanam
analyzed: bhṛṇvantu śrāvakāḥ sarve bodhi saniśritāḥ ca ye mahā udam vacanam mantram gṛhṇa tvam vyādhi nāśanam

original: || kṣudvyādhipīḍitā ye tu ye tu sattvā pipāsitāḥ | sarvaduḥkhopaśāntyartha śṛṇvadhvaṃ bhūmikāṃkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: kṣudh vyādhi pīḍitāḥ ye tu ye tu pipāsitāḥ sarva duḥkha upaśānti artha śṛṇvadhvam bhūmi kāṃkṣiṇaḥ

original: || ityevamuktvā muniprakhye kāśyapo'sau mahādyutiḥ | śravakā tuṣṭamanaso prārthayāmāsa taṃ vibhum
analyzed: iti evam uktvā muni prakhye sau mahā dyutiḥ prārthayāmāsa tam vibhum

original: || ekādaśaḥ paṭalavisaraḥ | badasva mantraṃ dharmajño dharmarājā mahāmuniḥ
analyzed: ekādaśaḥ paṭala visaraḥ badasva mantram dharma jñaḥ dharmarājā mahā muniḥ
sattva anukampakaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ

original: || ityuktvā sunibhiḥ mantraṃ bhāṣeta vistaram | kalaviṅkarutāghoṣā dundubhīmeghanisvanaḥ
analyzed: iti uktvā mantram bhāṣeta vistaram kalaviṅka ruta āghoṣā dundubhī megha nisvanaḥ

original: || brahmasvaro mahāvīryo brahmaṇo hyagraṇī jinaḥ | śṛṇvantu bhūtasaṅghā vai ye kecidihāgatāḥ
analyzed: brahma svaraḥ mahā vīryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ hi agraṇī jinaḥ śṛṇvantu bhūta saṅghāḥ vai ye kecid iha āgatāḥ

original: || apadā bahupadā cāpi dvipadā cāpi catuṣpadāḥ | saṃkṣepato sarvasattvārtha mantraṃ bhāṣe nuskhodayam
analyzed: apadāḥ bahu padā ca api dvipadā ca api catuṣpadāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ sarva sattva artha mantram bhāṣe

original: || atītānāgatā sattvā vartamānā ihāgatāḥ | saṃkṣepato nu vakṣyāmi śṛṇvadhvaṃ bhūtakāṃkṣiṇam
analyzed: sattvāḥ vartamānāḥ iha āgatāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ nu vakṣyāmi śṛṇvadhvam bhūta kāṃkṣiṇam
iti namaḥ sarva buddhānām apratihata śāsanānām

original: || tadyathā - “ gagane gaganagañja ānaya sarva lahu lahu samayamanusmara ākarṣīṇa
analyzed: tat yathā gagane gagana gañje ānaya sarva lahu lahu samayam anusmara ākarṣīṇa

original: mā vilamba yathepsitaṃ me sampādaya svāhā
analyzed: mā vilamba yathā īpsitam me sampādaya svāhā
iti evam uktvā bhagavam kāśyapaḥ tūṣṇī abhūt

original: atrāntare bhagavatā kāśyapena samyak sambuddhena vidyāmantrapa- dāni savistarāṇi sarvaṃ taṃ gaganaṃ mahāībhojanaparipūrṇamedhaṃ sandṛśyate sma
analyzed: atrā antare bhagavatā kāśyapena samyak sambuddhena vidyā mantra pa dāni sa vistarāṇi sarvam tam gaganam mahā āī bhojana paripūrṇa medham sandṛśyate sma

original: sarva taṃ trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ bhojanameghasañchannagaga- natalaṃ sandṛśyate sma
analyzed: tam tri sāhasram mahā sāhasra lokadhātum bhojana megha sañchanna gaga na talam sandṛśyate sma

original: yathāśayasattvabhojanamabhikāṃkṣiṇaṃ yathābhiru- citamāhāraṃ tattasmai pravartate sma
analyzed: yathā āśaya sattva bhojanam abhikāṃkṣiṇam yathā abhirucitam āhāram tat tasmai pravartate sma

original: yathābhirucitaiśrāhāraiḥ bhojanakṛtyaṃ kṣuduḥsvapraśamanārtha pipāsitasya pānaṃ pānīyaṃ cāṣṭāṅgopetaṃ vāridhāraṃ tatraiva manīṣitaṃ nipatati sma ||
analyzed: yathā abhirucitaiḥ āhāraiḥ bhojana kṛtyam kṣu duḥsva praśamana artha pipāsitasya pānam pānīyam ca aṣṭāṅga upetam vāri dhāram tatra eva manīṣitam nipatati sma

original: sarvasattvāśca tasmi samaye tasmi kṣaṇe sarvaśvadyādhipraśamana- sarvatṛṣāpanayanaṃ ca kṛtāmabhūt
analyzed: sarva sattvāḥ ca tasmi samaye tasmi kṣaṇe sarva śvadya ādhi praśamana sarva tṛṣā apanayanam ca

original: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat āścaryaprāpto audvilyaprāpto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinanya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śi- rasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitā
analyzed: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad āścarya prāptaḥ audvilya prāptaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhinanya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau rasā vanditvā tatra eva antarhitā

original: bhagavāṃ kāśyapaśca tathāgatavihāraiḥ bihāriyuriti mayā ca bhagavato śākyamunināpyetahiṃ bhāṣitā cā bhyanumoditā ca ||
analyzed: bhagavān kāśyapaḥ ca tathāgata vihāraiḥ bihāriyuḥ iti mayā ca bhagavataḥ śākyamuninā api etahim bhāṣitā ca abhyanumoditā ca

original: mañjuśrīmūlakalpe asmi kalparājottame sarvasattvānāmarthāya śrutpipāsāpanaya- nārtha sarvamantrajāpināṃ ca viśeṣataḥ pūrva tāvajjāpinā imaṃ mantraṃ sādha- yitavyam

analyzed: hema varṇāḥ yat ākāśe ketavaḥ udayanti vai tatra vidyāt mahat duḥkham sarva sattveṣu lakṣaṇam

original: mahāmārigatādhyakṣo janāsveva nibodhitā | dvādaśābdaṃ tathā hanti anāvṛṣṭayopadravādiṣu ||
analyzed: nibodhitā dvādaśa abdam tathā hanti anāvṛṣṭayā upadrava ādiṣu
atikṛṣṇā raudram iti āhuḥ ati dhūmrāḥ tu varjitā atasī puṣpa saṅkāśā pāvaka ucchiṣṭa varjitā

original: mahāmeghasamākārā nīlakajjalavarṇitā | varāhākāra tathā kecit parapuṣṭasamaprabhā ||
analyzed: mahā megha sama ākārāḥ nīla kajjala varṇitāḥ varāha ākāra tathā kecid parapuṣṭa sama prabhā

original: dṛśyante gagamā ghorā tasmād deśādapakramet | mahākrūrā tathā raudrā dṛśyante krūrakarmiṇaḥ ||
analyzed: dṛśyante gagamāḥ ghorā tasmāt deśāt apakramet mahā krūrā tathā raudrāḥ dṛśyante krūra karmiṇaḥ

original: mahāduḥkhaṃ mahāghoraṃ māryopasṛṣṭireva vā | mahādurbhikṣamityāhustasmi deśe bhayānakam ||
analyzed: mahā duḥkham mahā ghoram mārya upasṛṣṭiḥ eva vā mahā durbhikṣam iti āhuḥ tasmi deśe bhayānakam

original: oḍpuṣpasamākāraṃ raktabhāskaravidviṣam | asṛgvarṇa yadā paśyeduditaṃ ketunabhastalam ||
analyzed: oṃ puṣpa sama ākāram rakta bhāskara vidviṣam asṛj varṇa yadā paśyet uditam ketu nabhastalam

original: sarvatra vyādhitadvegaṃ bahusattvoparodhinam | nṛpatīnāṃ tadā mṛtyustatkṣaṇādevamādiśet ||
analyzed: sarvatra vyādhi tad dvegam bahu sattva uparodhinam nṛpatīnām tadā mṛtyuḥ tad kṣaṇāt evam ādiśet

original: akasmāt paśyate yo hi naro vā yadi vā striyaḥ | tasya mṛtyu samādiṣṭaṃ saptāhābhyantareṇa tu ||
analyzed: akasmāt paśyate yaḥ hi naraḥ vā yadi vā striyaḥ tasya mṛtyu samādiṣṭam sapta aha abhyantareṇa tu

original: dvirātraistribhirvāpi divasaiḥ śastribhirhanyate | tadā divā vā yadi vā paśyedakasmābhiśireva vā ||
analyzed: dvi rātraiḥ tribhiḥ vā api divasaiḥ śastribhiḥ hanyate tadā divā vā yadi vā vā

original: tasya mṛtyu samādiṣṭā tatkṣaṇādeva bhūtale | viṣeṇa hanyate jantuḥ śastribhirvā na saṃśayaḥ ||
analyzed: tasya tad kṣaṇāt eva bhū tale viṣeṇa hanyate jantuḥ śastribhiḥ vā na saṃśayaḥ

original: śuklā snigdhavarṇāśca niśireva sukhodayā | anyathā darśanaṃ neṣṭaṃ vividhākārarūpiṇām ||
analyzed: śuklā snigdha varṇāḥ ca niśiḥ eva sukha udayā anyathā darśanam na iṣṭam vividha ākāra rūpiṇām

original: mañjuśrīmūlakalpe svakāyaparakāye vā yadi ketusamāśritā | rātrau cāpi divā cāpi sadyaḥ prāṇaharāḥ smṛtā ||
analyzed: mañjuśrī mūla kalpe sva kāya para kāye vā yadi ketu samāśritā rātrau ca api divā ca api sadyas prāṇa harāḥ smṛtā

original: śuklavarṇā yadā paśye śaśigokṣīrasamaprabhām | himakundasamākārāṃ nānāratnasamaprabhām ||
analyzed: śukla varṇā yadā paśye śaśi go kṣīra sama prabhām hima kunda sama ākārām nānā ratna sama prabhām

original: tasya rājyaṃ samākhyātaṃ siddhirvā mantrajāpine | ete ketavo iṣṭā śarīre mandire'pi vā ||
analyzed: tasya rājyam samākhyātam siddhiḥ vā mantra jāpine ete ketavaḥ iṣṭā śarīre mandire vā

original: svasainyaparasainye vā yatrasthaṃ tatra phalapradam | tamāhuḥ kīrtitāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ nānācitrasamaprabhām ||
analyzed: sva sainya para sainye vā yatrastham tatra phala pradam tam āhuḥ kīrtitām śreṣṭhām nānā citra sama prabhām

original: dṛśyante sarvato matyaiḥ vahvārthāvahāḥ smṛtāḥ | sarvataḥ kathitā matryairvigrahe mandire'pi vā ||
analyzed: dṛśyante sarvatas matyaiḥ vahu artha āvahāḥ smṛtāḥ sarvatas kathitāḥ matryaiḥ vigrahe mandire vā

original: ketavaḥ siddhakāyānāṃ sarveṣṭāḥ saphalāḥ smṛtāḥ | anyathā kutsitāḥ sarve bahuduḥkhabhayapradāḥ ||
analyzed: ketavaḥ siddha kāyānām sarva iṣṭāḥ saphalāḥ smṛtāḥ anyathā kutsitāḥ sarve bahu duḥkha bhaya pradāḥ

original: sarve vai kathitā hyete ketavo grahacihnitāḥ | pūrvavat kathitaṃ sarve tithinakṣatrarāśijāḥ ||
analyzed: sarve vai kathitāḥ hi ete ketavaḥ graha cihnitāḥ pūrvavat kathitam sarve tithi nakṣatra rāśi jāḥ

original: vividhairvārayogaistu grahaiścāpi maharddhikāḥ | pūrvavat sarvamityeṣāṃ kathitāḥ sarvataḥ loke ||
analyzed: vividhaiḥ vāra yogaiḥ tu grahaiḥ ca api maharddhikāḥ pūrvavat sarvam iti eṣām kathitāḥ sarvatas loke

original: tadā sarve te saṃjñino keciccārusamaprabhā | citrā kacittataḥ śubhraḥ snigdho varṇataḥ śubhaḥ ||
analyzed: tadā sarve te saṃjñinaḥ kecid cāru sama prabhā citrā kacid tatas śubhraḥ snigdhaḥ varṇataḥ śubhaḥ

original: sunetro netranāmaḥ śaśikundasamaprabhaḥ | sudhū sunayanacaiva rugmavarṇaḥ sahemajaḥ ||
analyzed: sunetraḥ netra nāmaḥ śaśi kunda sama prabhaḥ rugma varṇaḥ sa hema jaḥ

original: sarve sitā vicitrāśca nānānāmasamoditāḥ | ṣaḍvarṇānāmapi teṣāṃ ketūnāṃ nibodhitā ||
analyzed: sarve sitāḥ vicitrāḥ ca nānā nāma sama uditāḥ ṣaṣ varṇānām api teṣām ketūnām nibodhitā

original: nānāvarṇarūpāṇāṃ tatsaṃjñāśca prayojayet | nānāvikṛtino ye'pi ye'pi ghorāḥ sudāruṇāḥ ||
analyzed: nānā varṇa rūpāṇām tad saṃjñāḥ ca prayojayet nānā vikṛtinaḥ ye ye pi ghorāḥ su dāruṇāḥ

original: ye mayā kathitā pūrva tatsaṃjñāśca sarvataḥ | evamādyādhikā proktā ketavo bahurūpiṇaḥ ||
analyzed: ye mayā kathitā tad saṃjñāḥ ca sarvatas evamādya adhikā proktā ketavaḥ bahu rūpiṇaḥ
viṃśaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: mānuṣāṇāṃ tadā cakre śubhāśubhaphalodayāḥ | vigrahā grahamukhyānāṃ dṛśyate ca samantataḥ ||
analyzed: mānuṣāṇām tadā cakre śubha aśubha phala udayāḥ vigrahāḥ graha mukhyānām dṛśyate ca samantataḥ

original: devāsure ca yuddhe vai darśayanti tadātmanām | mahāprabhāvā maheśākhyā divyā divyayonayaḥ ||
analyzed: devāsure ca yuddhe vai darśayanti tad ātmanām mahā prabhāvāḥ maheśākhyāḥ divyāḥ divya yonayaḥ

original: sitāḥ śubhodayāḥ sarve devaparpatsamāśritāḥ | vikṛtāvikṛtarūpāstu kutsitā vikṛtavārṇanaḥ ||
analyzed: sitāḥ śubha udayāḥ sarve deva parpad samāśritāḥ vikṛta avikṛta rūpāḥ tu kutsitāḥ

original: sarve vai asurapakṣe tu krūrakarmāntacāriṇā | yadā devāsure yuddhe vartamāne mahadbhaye ||
analyzed: sarve vai asura pakṣe tu krūra karmānta cāriṇā yadā devāsure yuddhe vartamāne mahat bhaye

original: asurāḥ parājitā devaiḥ ketavaḥ sūcayanti te | darśane bhū(ta)le martya pradadyuḥ sarvato nabhaḥ ||
analyzed: asurāḥ parājitāḥ devaiḥ ketavaḥ sūcayanti te darśane martya pradadyuḥ sarvatas nabhaḥ

original: sitāḥ śubhaphalā nityamiṣṭāścaiva surapriyā | darśayanti tadātmānaṃ devapakṣasamāśritāḥ ||
analyzed: sitāḥ śubha phalāḥ nityam iṣṭāḥ ca eva sura priyāḥ darśayanti tadā ātmānam deva pakṣa samāśritāḥ

original: martyānāṃ tadā kṣipraṃ subhikṣamārogyavinirdiśet | asurairnirjitā devā yadā kāle bhavanti vai ||
analyzed: martyānām tadā kṣipram subhikṣam ārogya vinirdiśet asuraiḥ nirjitāḥ devāḥ yadā kāle bhavanti vai

original: tadā vikṛvarṇāstu krūrakarmaniyojitāḥ | asurāṇāṃ tadā pakṣe ketava udayanti vai ||
analyzed: tadā krūra karma niyojitāḥ asurāṇām tadā pakṣe ketavaḥ udayanti vai

original: tadā sarvataḥ krūrā vātā vāyanti jantunām | mahādṛṣṭimanādṛṣṭināgāścaiva kūriṇaḥ ||
analyzed: tadā sarvatas krūrāḥ vātāḥ vāyanti jantunām mahādṛṣṭi manādṛṣṭi nāgāḥ ca eva kūriṇaḥ

original: mumoca viṣajāṃ toyaṃ bahuvyādhisamākulam | mānuṣāṇāṃ tadā cakre viṣavisphoṭamūrcchanam ||
analyzed: mumoca viṣa jām toyam bahu vyādhi samākulam mānuṣāṇām tadā cakre viṣa visphoṭa mūrcchanam

original: vividhā rākṣasā caiva daityayakṣasamāśritā | kurvanti mānuṣāṃ hiṃsāmatidāruṇavighnakām ||
analyzed: vividhā ca eva daitya yakṣa samāśritā kurvanti mānuṣām hiṃsām ati dāruṇa vighnakām

original: prāṇāparodhinaṃ duḥkhaṃ kurvantīha mahītale | aśmavṛṣṭiṃ tadākāśe prapated bhūtale tadā ||
analyzed: prāṇa aparodhinam duḥkham kurvanti iha mahī tale aśma vṛṣṭim tad ākāśe prapatet bhū tale tadā

original: mahāvātāḥ pravāyanti tasmi kāle tu bhīṣaṇāḥ | pracaṇḍā vāyavo vānti bahusattvāpakāriṇaḥ ||
analyzed: mahā vātāḥ pravāyanti tasmin kāle tu bhīṣaṇāḥ pracaṇḍāḥ vāyavaḥ vānti bahu sattva apakāriṇaḥ

original: manjuśrīmūlakalpe nānātiryagatā prāṇā sasyanāśaṃ pracakrire | bahubhūtagaṇāḥ krūrā kurvantīha ca bhūtale ||
analyzed: manjuśrī mūla kalpe sasya nāśam pracakrire bahu bhūta gaṇāḥ krūrā kurvanti iha ca bhū tale

original: mānuṣāṇāṃ tadā vighnaṃ cakrire prāṇoparodhinām | evamprakārā hyanekāśca bahuvighnasamāśrayā ||
analyzed: mānuṣāṇām tadā vighnam cakrire prāṇa uparodhinām evamprakārāḥ hi anekāḥ ca bahu vighna samāśrayā

analyzed: nānā tiryaggatāḥ ca eva caṇḍāḥ śvāpada mauragāḥ vividhāḥ sattvānām apakārakāḥ

analyzed: vāyanti vividhāḥ loke yadā adharmiṣṭhā tadā martyāḥ jāmbūdvīpa gatā sadā

original: tadā te devapakṣāstu hīyante daityayonibhiḥ | yadā dharmavataḥ sattvā bhūtale'smi samāgatā ||
analyzed: tadā te deva pakṣāḥ tu hīyante daitya yonibhiḥ yadā dharmavataḥ sattvā bhū tale smi samāgatā

analyzed: buddha dharma ratāḥ śreṣṭhā saṅge ca eva sadā varā mātṛ pitṛ bhaktāḥ ca satya sattvāḥ jape ratā

analyzed: tadā te sarvatas devāḥ nirjije daitya yoni jam tadā sasya phala sampannā bahu pūrṇā vasundharā

original: dīrghakālāyuṣo martyā bahusaṅkhyaparāyaṇā dhārmikā nṛpatayaḥ sarve sukhadāḥ saukhyaparāyaṇāḥ ||
analyzed: dīrgha kāla āyuṣaḥ martyāḥ bahu saṅkhya parāyaṇāḥ dhārmikāḥ nṛpatayaḥ sarve sukha dāḥ saukhya parāyaṇāḥ

original: tadā tāsu sukhā saityā hādino vyādhināśakāḥ | bhaveyuḥ sarve te loke sukhakāraṇaśītalāḥ
analyzed: tadā tāsu sukhā hādinaḥ vyādhi nāśakāḥ bhaveyuḥ sarve te loke sukha kāraṇa śītalāḥ

analyzed: gati śītā na ca uṣṇāḥ vai ṛtavaḥ sukha dā sadā nānā pakṣi gaṇāḥ ca eva kūjayet madhuram sadā

original: bahupuṣpaphalāḍhyā tu taravaḥ sarvato śubhā | sarve vyādhivinirmuktā jantavo bhūnivāsinaḥ
analyzed: bahu puṣpa phala āḍhyā tu taravaḥ śubhā sarve vyādhi vinirmuktāḥ jantavaḥ bhū nivāsinaḥ

original: na codvegaṃ tadā cakre nṛpatirdhārmiko bhavet
analyzed: na ca udvegam tadā cakre nṛpatiḥ dhārmikaḥ bhavet
bahu dhānya sukhā ca eva nānā ranatha mandirām

original: dharmāyatanaśatrāśca kūpavāpya samantataḥ | kurvante ca janāḥ sarve jambūdvīpagatā narāḥ
analyzed: samantataḥ kurvante ca janāḥ sarve jambūdvīpa gatāḥ narāḥ

analyzed: bahudhā bahuvidhāḥ ca eva prāṇi dharma rataḥ sthitāḥ samantāt teṣām yasya pūrṇā basundharā

original: viparītā tadanyathā teṣāṃ bhraṣṭamaryādaceṣṭitām | karme yugādhame kāle anyathā phalamādiśet
analyzed: viparītā tad anyathā teṣām bhraṣṭa maryāda ceṣṭitām yuga adhame kāle anyathā phalam ādiśet

analyzed: niḥphalam sa phalam ca eva vikṛtam hetu jam karma aśubhā ca eva kāmayet

bodhisattva piṭakāvatasaṃkāt mahāyāna vaipulma sūtrāt ārya mañjuśriya mūla kalpāt caturthaḥ nimitta jñāna mahā utpāda paṭala parivartaḥ parisamāptaḥ iti
atha ekaviṃśaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: atha khalu bhagavāṃśchākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhābāsabhavanamavalokya manjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punar api śuddhābāsa bhavanam avalokya manjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma
asti mañjuśrīḥ

original: tvadīye kalpa- visare sarvasādhanopayike mantracaryābhiyuktasya sādhanakāle sarvamantrā- ṇāṃ sarvakalpavistareṣu rāhurāgamanasurāṇāmadhipateḥ sarvagrahānāyakasya grahasaṃjñā candradivākarādiṣu nakṣatrayogena dṛśyante
analyzed: tvadīye kalpa visare sarva sādhana upayike mantra caryā abhiyuktasya sādhana kāle sarva mantrāṇām sarva kalpa vistareṣu rāhu rāgamana surāṇām adhipateḥ sarva graha ānāyakasya graha saṃjñā candra

original: taṃ śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru te bhāṣiṣye
analyzed: tam śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru te bhāṣiṣye

original: evamukte bhagavatā śākyamuninā samyak sambuddhena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatastriḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jā- numaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃ tenāñjali pragṛhya bhagavata- ścaraṇayornipatya punarevotthāya bhagavantamanimiṣaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ utphullanayano bhūtvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭo bhagavantametramāha- tat sādhu bhagavāṃ nirdiśatu rāhorāgamanam

original: yatra sattvānāṃ mantracaryābhiyuktānāṃ siddhi- kālaṃ bhaveyuriti sarvasattvānāṃ ca sukhodayaṃ śubhāśubhānimittaṃ vāḥ
analyzed: yatra sattvānām mantra caryā abhiyuktānām siddhi kālam bhaveyuḥ iti sarva sattvānām ca sukha udayam śubha aśubha a nimittam vār
tam nirdiśatu bhagavān
yasya idānīm kālam manyase

original: yastvaṃ tathāgatametamartha paripraśnase sarvasattvānāṃ ca hitāyodyuktaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tvam tathāgatam etam artha paripraśnase sarva sattvānām ca hitāya udyuktaḥ

original: ādau tāva grahaiḥ krūraiḥ rāhoścandramaṇḍale | āgamodite kāle yathāvantaṃ nibodhitā
analyzed: ādau tāva grahaiḥ krūraiḥ rāhoḥ candra maṇḍale āgama udite kāle yathāvantam nibodhitā

analyzed: mahābhayaḥ pramāṇāḥ vai samantāt ucchritaḥ mahān sumeroḥ adhikaḥ bhavet

analyzed: mahā pramāṇaḥ ati darpa ati dūrpitaḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ grahaḥ mukhyaḥ yadā bheje surālayam

tṛtīyena bhavet mṛtyuḥ mā ādiṣṭaḥ tatra vai
caturthena bhavet mṛryuḥ mukhyānām ca dhana īśvarām

original: pañcame dhananāśaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhe vyātri sambhavet
analyzed: pañcame dhana nāśam tu ṣaṣṭhe vyātri sambhavet

original: saptamena bhave duḥkhaṃ sarvato ca bhayāvaham ||
analyzed: saptamena bhave duḥkham ca bhaya āvaham

original: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vindyā pūrva vai sarvato tadā
analyzed: aṣṭame niḥphalam vai tadā
uttare pūrvayoḥ madhye vidikṣu ca eva lakṣayet

original: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā
analyzed: ati krūrā yadā kṣipram śivā vyāharate tadā
uttare pūrvatas madhye lakṣayet

original: atikrūrā yadā kṣipraṃ śivā vyāharate tadā
analyzed: ati krūrā yadā kṣipram śivā vyāharate tadā
mṛtyunā hanyate jantuḥ paiaura mukhyaḥ dhaneśvaraḥ
dvitīyena hanet matrī tṛtīye gajam ādiśe
caturthe vividha yonyāḥ tu mleccha taskara jīvinaḥ

original: caturthena bhaved vyādhiḥ sarveṣāṃ ca tadā jane
analyzed: caturthena bhavet vyādhiḥ sarveṣām ca tadā jane

original: pañcame hanyate putro amātyo vā nṛpaterbhuvam ||
analyzed: pañcame hanyate putraḥ amātyaḥ vā nṛpateḥ bhuvam
ṣaṣṭhe mṛtyum ādiṣṭā mahādevyā tu narādhipe

original: saptamena haned rāṣṭra muktaṃ cāpi vinirdiśet ||
analyzed: saptamena hanet rāṣṭra muktam ca api vinirdiśet

original: aṣṭame niḥphalaṃ vindyā pūrvavat kathitā sadā
analyzed: aṣṭame niḥphalam vindyā pūrvavat kathitā sadā

original: ataḥ ūrdhva tathā rātro śivānāṃ ca bhave yadā ||
analyzed: atas ūrdhva śivānām ca bhave yadā
dvāviṃśatitamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ
amānuṣam tam viduḥ mayā om mahā upadrava kārakam
apakramya tatas gacche mantraiḥ vā rakṣam ādiśet
mahā prabhāvaiḥ vikhyātaiḥ jina abja kulayā udbhavaiḥ
homa kaṃrmāṇi kurvīta śānti tatra samādiśet
evamprakārāḥ hi anekāni bahu bhāṣyā paśu yonayaḥ
nānā pakṣi gaṇān ca api rutam ca eva nibodhaye
bahudhā tiryak atā kecid cāpa su mūtrtti jā
kecid vikṛta rūpāḥ tu raudrā sattva viheṭhakā

original: kecit prāṇāparodhikāṃ sattvāṃ hiṇḍyante'tha mahītale asṛkpānaratā kecid anvāhiṇḍānta medinī
analyzed: kecid prāṇa aparodhikām mahī tale asṛj pāna ratā kecid medinī
kecid rudhira gandhena bhramante medinī talam
vividhāḥ mātarā hi ete graha mukhyāḥ tu bāliśā
kumārakumārikā rūpāḥ grahāḥ proktāḥ vividhā parā
bhramante medinīm kṛtsnām kṣaṇa mātreṇa sarvatas
sahasram yojanam kecid vāyu vat bhramatā aparāḥ

original: paśuveṣakṛtā kecid dṛṣṭyā naṣṭā ca jantuṣu
analyzed: paśu veṣa kṛtā kecid dṛṣṭyā naṣṭā ca jantuṣu

original: vividhaṃ karoti sarve te sarvatra vasudhātale
analyzed: vividham karoti sarve te sarvatra vasudhā tale
mṛta pūtaka sattveṣu supte upahate tathā
mānuṣām kecid bali mālya artha kāraṇāt
sarveṣām mānuṣām loke kramante kecid nabhastalāt
saṃrva ākāra vidaḥ jñeyāḥ bahu rūpāḥ vikāriṇaḥ
śubhāḥ aśubha rāvāḥ ca jñeyāḥ liṅgaiḥ tu sarvatas
śubha aśubha phalam sarva vikṛtam sukṛtam tathā
āgamaiḥ bahuvidhaiḥ jñeyāḥ loka tattva artha cihnitaiḥ
ṛṣibhiḥ jina sutaiḥ ca eva khaṅgibhiḥ jiina varaiḥ sadā
śrāvakaiḥ maharddhikaiḥ nānā yoni samāthitam
manjuśrī mūlakalpe grahaiḥ graha varaiḥ khyātaiḥ prakṛṣṭaiḥ loka cihnitaiḥ
jñeyam vā
nānā liṅga vidhānena gati yoni vibhāvataḥ

original: jñeyaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ sarva krūraiḥ saumyaiśca liṅgibhiḥ ||
analyzed: jñeyam śubha aśubham krūraiḥ saumyaiḥ ca liṅgibhiḥ

original: chatraṃ śitaṃ patākaṃ ca matsaṃ māṃsaṃ ca sārdrayoḥ
analyzed: chatram śitam patākam ca matsam māṃsam ca sa ārdrayoḥ

original: utkṣiptā ca medinī padmayantra gomayaṃ tadā ||
analyzed: utkṣiptā ca medinī gomayam tadā

original: dadhi puṣpaṃ phalaṃ caiva striyaṃ vāmbarabhūṣitām
analyzed: dadhi puṣpam phalam ca eva striyam vā ambara bhūṣitām
tathā jñeyam dvijam śreyārtha bhāṣiṇam

original: vṛṣaṃ gajaṃ tathā jñeyaṃ aśvaṃ cāmarabhūṣitam
analyzed: vṛṣam gajam tathā jñeyam aśvam cāmara bhūṣitam
pradīpam bhājane nyastam pūrṇa dhānya phala udayam
deva dvija pratimām vā pūjyamānā sadā nṛpaiḥ
abhiṣeka artha yuktam vā nṛpa vimbā atha mantriṇām

original: śaṅkhasvanaṃ bherīṃśca paṭahaṃ cāpi sudundubhim | ghaṇṭāśabdaṃ pradṛṣṭaṃ ca jayaśabdaṃ praghoṣitam
analyzed: śaṅkha svanam bherīn ca paṭaham ca api su dundubhim ghaṇṭā śabdam pradṛṣṭam ca jaya śabdam praghoṣitam

original: mānuṣyodīritāṃ vācāṃ jayasiddhiphalapradam | etā nimittā māvedya iṣṭāṃ caiva niveditām
analyzed: mānuṣya udīritām vācām jaya siddhi phala pradam etāḥ nimittāḥ mā āvedya iṣṭām ca eva niveditām

original: sarvasampankaraṃ kṣemaṃ iṣṭaṃ caiva supūjitam | sarvā prāpnuyādoṃ saphalāṃ manasodbhavām
analyzed: sarva sampan karam kṣemam iṣṭam ca eva su pūjitam sarvā prāpnuyāt om saphalām manasā udbhavām

original: mantrajāpaṃ tato gacchet siddhayatthī siddhimādiśet | sarveṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prasthitānāṃ tu nirdiśet
analyzed: mantra jāpam tatas gacchet siddhayatthī siddhim ādiśet sarveṣām sarva sattvānām prasthitānām tu nirdiśet

original: yo'yaṃ devatādhyakṣa iṣṭo gotrajo paro | ādhyeṣṭayo bhavennityaṃ taṃ liṅgī paśyato phalam
analyzed: yaḥ yam devatā adhyakṣaḥ iṣṭaḥ bhavet nityam tam liṅgī phalam

original: vividhākāracihnāstu devāḥ proktāstu sarvadā | talliṅginā tathā proktā vividhā veṣacihnayaḥ
analyzed: vividha ākāra cihnāḥ tu devāḥ proktāḥ tu sarvadā tad liṅginā tathā proktāḥ vividhāḥ veṣa cihnayaḥ

original: yo yamiṣṭataraṃ paśyet so tasyaiva phalodayam | bācāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vatre yadā ve mānuṣā bhuvi
analyzed: yaḥ yam iṣṭataram paśyet saḥ tasya eva phala udayam bācām bahuvidhām yadā mānuṣāḥ bhuvi
dvāviṃśatitamaḥ paṭala visaraḥ

original: kathayanti śubhāṃ vācāṃ anyonyālāpamāsṛtāḥ | pareṣāṃ ca yadā vatre viśvastāśca samantataḥ
analyzed: kathayanti śubhām vācām anyonya ālāpam āsṛtāḥ pareṣām ca yadā vatre viśvastāḥ ca samantataḥ

original: evaṃ ca vācire mūcuḥ śubhaṃ śreyaṃ japaṃ sadā | kṣemamārogyasarva vai svastiśāntisukhodayaḥ
analyzed: evam ca vācire mūcuḥ śubham śreyam japam sadā kṣemam ārogya sarva vai svasti śānti sukha udayaḥ

original: dhaninaḥ devato mukhya suro dharmarājāstathā | sarvato bhāskaraścaiva chatradhvajapatākayoḥ
analyzed: dhaninaḥ suraḥ dharmarājāḥ tathā sarvatas bhāskaraḥ ca eva chatra dhvaja patākayoḥ

original: buddhadharmatadā saṅgha mantraṃ tāramitiḥ sadā | kumāraṃ kāñcanaṃ śubhraṃ agniskandhaṃ mahotsavam
analyzed: saṅgha mantram tāra mitiḥ sadā kumāram kāñcanam śubhram agni skandham mahā utsavam

original: jinaṃ padma tathā vajraṃ lokeśaṃ bodhimuttamam | bodhisattvā tathā lokāṃ brahmaścaiva surottamām
analyzed: jinam padma tathā vajram lokeśam bodhim uttamam bodhisattvāḥ tathā brahmaḥ ca eva sura uttamām

original: bahuprakārā hyanekāni praśastāṃ sādhuvarṇitām | śuśrāva śabdāṃ yathā gantā sarvāsāṃ prāpnuyā hi sau
analyzed: bahu prakārā hi anekāni praśastām sādhu varṇitām śuśrāva śabdām yathā gantā sarvāsām hi

original: tato'nye lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa śabdaṃ cāpi ninditam | praśastā śakunayo hyetā prasthitānāṃ jape ratām
analyzed: tatas nye loka vidviṣṭam sa śabdam ca api ninditam praśastā śakunayaḥ hi etā prasthitānām jape ratām

original: sarveṣāṃ ca mayaṃ yogo udyogārthasasampadām | tato'nya ninditaṃ sarva na lebhe kāyitaṃ phalam
analyzed: sarveṣām ca mayam yogaḥ udyoga artha sa sampadām tatas ninditam na lebhe phalam

original: praśastaiva sarvato gacche apraśastaiśca na vrajet | praṇamya sarvato buddhāṃstrayaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
analyzed: praśastā eva sarvatas gacche apraśastaiḥ ca na vrajet praṇamya sarvatas buddhān trayam kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam

original: svamantraṃ matranāthaṃ ca mātāpitrau tha duḥkarām | praṇamya sarvato gacche śivaṃ tatra vinirdiśet
analyzed: sva mantram ca mātā pitrau duḥkarām praṇamya sarvatas gacche śivam tatra vinirdiśet

original: ācāryagurumukhyānāmupādhyāyaṃ caiva yatnataḥ | praśastadhārmakathika praśastaṃ caiva vrate ratam
analyzed: ācārya guru mukhyānām upādhyāyam ca eva yatnataḥ praśasta dhārma kathika praśastam ca eva vrate ratam

original: yathāīṃ tadābhyarcya iṣṭadevamanehitam | snātabhukto'tha viśvastaḥ pratyūṣe vā jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: tadā abhyarcya iṣṭadevam anehitam viśvastaḥ pratyūṣe vā jita indriyaḥ

original: śaucācārarato mantrī gacchet sarvato diśām | yathāśāphalasaṃyogaṃ prāpnuyāt sarvato śubhām
analyzed: śauca ācāra rataḥ mantrī gacchet sarvatas diśām yathā āśā phala saṃyogam prāpnuyāt śubhām

original: mañjuśrīmūlakalpe śāntisvastyayanaṃ caiva āyurārogyavarddhanam | śrīsampat kathitāmayyā yatheṣṭaṃ manasepsitam
analyzed: mañjuśrī mūlakalpe śānti svastyayanam ca eva āyuḥ ārogya varddhanam śrī sampad kathitā amayyā yathā iṣṭam manasā īpsitam

original: iti mahāyānavaipulyasūtrād bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakā- dāryamañjuśrīmūlakalpād viṃśatimaḥ sarva- bhūtarutajñānanimittaśakunanirdeśa- parivartapaṭalavisaraḥ pari- samāptamiti
analyzed: iti mahāyāna vaipulya sūtrāt bodhisattva piṭaka avataṃsakāḥ dārya mañjuśrī mūla kalpāt viṃśatimaḥ sarva bhūta ruta jñāna nimitta śakuna nirdeśa parivarta paṭala visaraḥ pari samāptam iti
śubham bhūyāt
